Nga tshifhinga tsha u lovha havho vho vha vha khou shuma kha Maan alanga a Vhu ivhavhufhufhi a Afrika Tshipembe. mu a na khonani dza Vho Marcelino dos Santos, mu we wa vhatumbuli vha Mozambique Liberation Front (FRELIMO), vhe vha lovha vha na mi waha ya 90. Murangaphan a wa kale vho vha mu we wa tshiga tsha vhulwelahaya ha Afrika. Vho vha vhe mulwelambofholowo wa kale wa Mozambique, na u dovha u vha rapolotiki na murendi vhe vha saina ma walo avho na madzina a khole khole a Lilinho Micaia and Kalungano.  E. U tholwaU tholwa ho he ho fhira kha khwa hisedzo ya ndalukano na thendelo yo teaho.16. Vho Busani Ngcaweni na  hoho kha Tshikolo tsha Lushaka tsha Muvhuso17. Vho Yoliswa Makhasi sa Mulanguli Dzhenerala wa Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.18. Vho Ayanda Kanana sa Muofisiri Muhulwane (CEO) na Mulangi Muhulwane wa Bannga ya Mveledziso ya zwa Vhulimi na Mavu19. Vho Basil Bryan Ford sa Mu hogomeli Muhulwane na Maan alanga a Muvhalelano kha Zhendedzi  a Tswikelo na Tshumelo yo Angaredzaho   a Afrika Tshipembe. 20. Vho Luvuyo Keyise sa Mu hogomeli Muhulwane na Maan alanga a Muvhalelano a Dzhendedzi  a Thekhino odzhi ya Mafhungo a Muvhuso. 21. Mira o ya Bodo ya Phaka dza Lushaka dza Afrika Tshipembe: a. Vho Zola Luxolo Fihlani; b. Vho Gertrude Buyelwa Koyana; c. Vho Faizal Docrat; d. Vho Jeoffrey Mashele.22.  Mira o ya Bodo ya Tshiimiswa tsha Bayodaivesithi ya Afrika Tshipembe.: a. Vho Phuthanang Cenea Motsielwa;b. Vho Pamela Bulelwa Yako; andc. Dokotela Vho Kowiyou Yessoufou.23. Mira o ya Bodo ya Maan alanga ya Isimangaliso Wetland Park:a. Phurofesa Vho Antonia Thandi Nzama (Mudzulatshidulo);b. Vho Nomagcisa Cawe;c. Phurofesa Vho Christopher Peter Small; d. Vho Leon Langalibalele;e. Vho Letlhogonolo Noge-Tungamirai;f. Vho Gonasagren Ganesh Nair; andg. Inkosi Tembe Mabhudu Israel;h. Muimeli wa Maan alanga a Vhuendelamashango ha KwaZulu-Natal:i.  CEO; j.  Muimeli wa Muhasho wa Mupo, Ma aka na Vhureakhovhe.Yo vhudziswa:Vho Phumla Williams    Muambeli wa Khabinethe o tou farelaho Sele: 083 501 0139

title: Tshitatamennde tsha Mu angano wa Khabinethe we wa farwa nga  a 11  hafamuhwe 2020
text: Tshitatamennde kha Mu angano wa Khabinethe we wa farwa nga  avhuraru, 11  hafamuhwe 2020 ngei Tuynhuys  oroboni ya KapaA. Mafhungo a zwino kha Shango1. Coronavirus (COVID-19)1.1 Khabinethe i fulufhedzisa hafhu vhathu vho he Afrika Tshipembe uri maga o he a tsireledzo a khou dzhiwa u tsireledza shango kha dwadze  a COVID-19. Minis a wa Mutakalo, Vho Dokotela Zweli Mkhize, vho vhiga kha Khabinethe uri ho vha na zwiwo zwa 13 zwa COVID-19 Afrika Tshipembe. Matsheloni a  amusi, Minis a wa Mutakalo vho khwa hisedza uri ho dovha ha vhigwa zwi we zwiwo zwi a zwiswa, zwa swikisa tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwa COVID19 kha 17. Vha  o  etshedza zwi we zwidodombedzwa musi  uvha  ino  i tshi khou ya phan a .1.2 Khabinethe i dovholola khuwelelo nga Dzangano  a Mutakalo  a  ifhasi na Minis a wa Mutakalo Vho Mkhize, uri vhathu vho he fhano Afrika Tshipembe vha bvele phan a na u shumisa maga a thivhelo u fhelisa phiriselo na pha aladza ya vairasi. Maga a thivhelo a katela u  amba zwan a nga tshisibe na ma i tshifhinga tsho he kana u shumisa tshivhulazwitshili tsha zwan a tshi re na a ikhoholo, a katela na u litsha u fara kana u kwama ningo yavho, ma o na mulomo nga zwan a zwi songo  ambaho na u thivha mulomo wavho nga thishu musi vha tshi ho ola kana u atsamula vha fhedza vha la a thishu yeneyo. Tsumbadwadze dzo  oweleaho dza vairasi dzi katela, mufhiso, u ho ola na u kon elwa u fema. Musi vha na tsumbadwadze u ya nge he dza  alutshedzwa afho n ha, vhathu vha eletshedzwa u dzula hayani na u  o a thuso ya dzilafho.1.3 Ri ita khumbelo kha vho he ya u  honifha phuraivesi ya vhalwadze vha COVID-19 na mi a yavho. Ri dovha ra tsivhudza zwihulwane kha u pha aladza mafhungo ma we na ma we a mazwifhi a elanaho na vairasi u itela u thivhela pha aladzo ya mazwifhi, samba na khethululano zwitshavhani zwashu. Vhathu vhane vha vha na mbilaelo vha nga kwama Lu ingo lwa shishi lwa Tshiimiswa tsha Lushaka tsha Malwadze a Phirela (NICD) kha 0800 029 999 u wana mafhungo a vhukuma malugana na  COVID-19.1.4 Khabinethe i  anganela na Muphuresidennde Vho  Cyril Ramaphosa kha u tamela mashudu thimu ya u vhuisa vhathu hayani na  vhashumi vha Vhufhufhi ha Afrika Tshipembe (SAA) vhe vha  uwa nga  avhuvhili u ya  oroboni ya Wuhan, kha Vundu  a Hubei ngei kha People s Republic of China, u vhuisa hayani maAfrika Tshipembe vha 122. Thimu ya zwa dzilafho u bva kha Muhasho wa Mutakalo na vha Tshumelo ya Mutakalo ya Vhuswole ha Afrika Tshipembe zwi vhumba tshipi a tsha thimu ya u vhuisa vhathu hayani. Khabinethe yo isa ndivhuwo kha SAA kha thusedzo yavho ya vhu hogwa kha mushumo uyu wa u vhuisa vhathu hayani.1.5 Thimu ya u vhuisa vhathu hayani na maAfrika Tshipembe vhane vha khou vhuiswa hayanI vha khou lavhelwa u vhuya fhano hayani nga  avhu anu  ene i,  a 13  hafamuhwe 2020. Musi vha tshi vhuya, vha  o valelwa thungo lwa tshifhinga tsha u bva kha ma uvha a 14 u swika kha ma uvha a 21. Nga tshifhinga itshi, mutshimbilo na u bva na u dzhena ha vhathu na thundu   vhuponi vhune vhathu avho vho valelwaho khaho a hu nga  o vulelwa nnyi na nnyi. 1.6 Ri khou tsivhudza zwihulwane vhathu kha u lingedza u  o a u kwamana nga muvhili  kana u lingedza u dalela vhupo he vhathu vha valelwaho thungo hone. Musi tshifhinga tsha u valelwa thungo tshi tshi fhela na ndingo dzo khwa hisedza uri a hu tshe na vhulwadze ha vairasi ya COVID-19 kha vhafuna shango vhashu, vha  o vhofholowa vha humela kha zwitshavha zwa havho nga u fhambanaho.1.7 Khabinethe i kho a mushumo wo itwaho nga Komiti ya Ngomu ya Dziminis a (MIC) ye ya kumedzwa mushumo wa u sedzana na COVID-19, yo rangwa phan a nga Minis a wa Mutakalo na u shumana na  NICD, kha u sala murahu vhu ala na u langa vairasi, musi vha tshi khou thusedza avho vha kwameaho ngayo na u bvela phan a na u  ivhadza lushaka maswa maswa.1.8 Khabinethe i livhuwa uri vhunzhi ha mavundu o fhirisela phan a vhudavhidzani ha mafhungo a COVID-19 kha Minis a wa Mutakalo nga ndeme yao khulwane ya u kwama lushaka na dzitshaka. Ri  u uwedza mavundu o he uri na one a ite nga u ralo u khwa hisedza uri vhudavhidzani vhu bve fhethu huthihi u itela u thivhela n a o dzi songo teaho na milaedza i songo konanywaho,1.9 Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa hu si kale vha  o  ivhadza mafhungo maswa maswa nga ha COVID-19 kha mahoro a polotiki o imelwaho Phalamennde khathihi na vharangaphan a vha kereke. Mu angano wa Khabinethe wo khetheaho nga  ha COVID-19 u khou fariwa nga Swondaha, ya  a 15  hafamuhwe 2020, ngei Tshwane.2. Ikonomi2.1 Khabinethe yo  o sedza kha u bviswa ha muvhigo wa vha Mbalombalo ya Afrika Tshipembe nga ha Zwibveledzwagu e Zwapo (GDP), we wa dzumbulula uri ikonomi yashu yo suvhela kha u wa ha ikonomi ya shango nga u tevhekana. Figara dzo sumbedza utsa ha GDP  nga  1.4% kha Kotara ya Vhu a ya 2019. Hezwi zwi tevhela u  ukufhala ha 0.8% kha Kotara ya Vhuraru ya  waha wonoyo.2.2 Nga nn a ha u  anganedza masiandaitwa a sa takadziho a vhangwaho nga u khaulwa ha mu agasi, Khabinethe i dzula yo  ikumedza kha u lugisa mitheo, u sala murahu masia a ndeme a nyaluwo na u tshimbidza thasululo ya  tshumisano na ma we masia a tshitshavha na muvhuso u itela uri ro he ri vhee shango kha n ila ya nyaluwo ya zwa ikonomi.2.3 Ri khou engedza vhubindudzi hashu nahone u swika zwino thandela dzi re na ndeme ya vhubindudzi vhu linganaho R9 bi ioni dzo khunyeledzwa na thandela dza 27 dza ndeme i fhiraho R250 bi ioni dzi kha lu a lwa u thoma u shumiwa, na nnzhi dzi no khou tevhela  waha uno.3. Mitengo ya data ya Vodacom3.1 Khabinethe i  anganedza n ivhadzo nga Khomishini ya Mu a isano nga ha thendelano ya mulayo ya tshiga tsha shango yo swikelelwaho nga Vodacom malugana na phungudzo ya mitengo ya data dzayo. Hezwi zwi  a nga murahu ha  ho isiso ya Makete wa Mu a isano kha tshumelo dza data dzo humbelwaho nga Minis a wa kale wa Mveledziso ya Ikonomi Vho Abrahim Patel nga 2017, ye ya wana uri mitengo ya data yo vha i n hesa u fhira kha ma we mashango manzhi na u khethulula kha vharengi vha shayaho. 3.2 Thendelano na Vodacom i khou thoma u shuma u bva nga  a 1 Lambamai 2020 nahone i  o ita uri mitengo ya data i fhungudzee u mona na bandi i dza  wedzi nga  wedzi, hune mutengo wa 1GB u  o tsa u bva kha R149 u ya kha R99 (phungudzo nga 34%), hu na luafhulelo hafhu  waha u  aho. Vodacom i  o dovha ya ita uri hu vhe na u wana data dza mahala kha vharengi kha dzi we webusaithi dzi thusaho tshitshavha u fana na GCIS, BizPortal ntswa na Wikipedia) na u kona u dzhena dziwebusaithi dza yunivesithi dza Afrika Tshipembe. Lu we luafhulelo lu  o shuma kha vharengi vha zwitshavha zwi shayaho zwi fhiraho 2 000 na vhashumisi vha  o vha na  phakhedzhi ya mutheo  ya milaedza ya SMS ya  uvha na  uvha ya mahala.4. U wanwa ha  Pioneer Foods nga PepsiCo4.1 Khabinethe i  anganedza thendelano ya u maan afhadza mushumo mulwane vhukuma na PepsiCo sa tshipi a tsha ngwano ya khamphani ya zwi iwa ya Afrika Tshipembe, ine ya vha Pioneer Foods. PepsiCo yo  ikumedzela kha mishumo, vhubindudzi khathihi na u maan afhadza vhadzulapo na thengo. Yo dovha ya tenda uri musanda wayo wa  Sub-Saharan u  o vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe.4.2 Vhashumi vha Pioneer Foods vha 10 000 na vhone vho tsireledzwa kha u fhelelwa nga mushumo nga vhanga  a u  angana ha dzikhamphani nahone PepisCo yo tenda u   hogomela  evele dza mushumo  hanganyelo kha  evele dza zwino lwa tshifhinga tsha mi waha mi anu. Vhashumi kha khamphani vha  o dovha vha  ewa mikovhe ya ndeme i fhiraho  R1.6 bi ioni  kha PepsiCo ine ya  o shumiswa u wana tshipi a tsha 13% kha Pioneer Foods kha tshifhinga tsha mi waha mi anu.5. Nndwa ya u tambudzwa ha vhana na vhafumakadzi5.1 Khabinethe yo  anganedza tsheo ya Khothe Khulwane ya Gauteng ya u hana u ita khumbelo ya kha hululo kha mulandu wa mutzhipi o gwevhiwaho, ane a vha Nicholas Ninow.  waha wo fhiraho, Ninow o  ewa tshigwevho tsha u dzula dzhele vhutshilo hawe ho he nga murahu ha u tzhipa musidzanyana wa mi waha ya sumbe kha restuarente ya Dros ngei Siverton, kha  a Pretoria nga 2018.5.2 Kha hulo, u gwevhiwa na u haniwa ha khumbelo ya kha hululo, zwi rumela mulaedza wo khwa haho kha zwigevhenga na vhane vha  o a u ita zwa vhugevhenga vha tshi tambudza vhana na vhafumakadzi wa uri, zwiimiswa zwa vhulamukanyi zwa Afrika Tshipembe zwi  o vha wana mulandu wa zwiito izwi zwa tshi uhu.5.3 Ro he khathihi ri fanela u fhelisa u tambudza hu dzhielaho fhasi pfanelo dza vhathu dza mutheo dza vhana na vhafumakadzi. Nga kha nyito dzashu dzo  anganelaho ri fanela u khwa hisedza uri a hu na mufumakadzi kana  wana ane a khou tambudzwa lwa vhudzekani, u rwiwa, u tzhipiwa kana u  haselwa fhethu hu we na hu we kha shango  ashu.6. Vhutsireledzi badani6.1 Khabinethe i livhisa ndiliso kha mi a ya 25 ya vha ameli vhe vha vha lovha nga u wa ha bisi tsini na Centane ngei Kapa Vhubva uvha mathomoni a  wedzi uno. I dovha ya tamela mashudu vha ameli vho huvhalaho vha 68 uri vha fhole nga u  avhanya.6.2  ho isiso nga vha Koporasi ya Ndangulo ya Vhuendi ha Badani na Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe zwi fanela u thusedza kha u  etshedza phindulo kha nyimele malugana na makhaulambilu aya. Vha etshedzi vha zwiendedzi vha na mushumo wa u ita zwo he zwine vha nga kona u khwa hisedza vhutsireledzi ha vha ameli vhavho. 6.3 Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Vhuendi ha Badani ha Lushaka wa 2019 Phalamenndeni. Wa vhuya wa phasiswa wa  vha mulayo, Mulayotibe u  o shela mulenzhe kha u fhungudza mabulayo dzibadani dzashu.B. Tsheo dza Khabinethe1. Pulane ya Tshi irathedzhi tsha Lushaka (NSP) ya Khakhathi dzo  isendekaho nga Mbeu na Mabulayo a Vhatshifumakadzini1.1 Nga Nyendavhusiku 2019, Khabinethe yo tendela GBVF-NSP. Yo dovha ya  ea ndaela thimu ya Dziminis a yo rangwaho phan a nga Minis a wa Ofisi ya Muphuresidennde ya Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali, Vho Maite Nkoana-Mashabane, uri vha engedze mushumo kha nzudzanyo ya zwa zwiimiswa zwa GBVF zwo dzinginywaho u ingamela mathomo a u shuma ha GBVF-NSP.1.2 U  anganedza luvhilo lwa u tshimbidza na u ingamela mushumo wa u fhelisa GBVF, Khabinethe yo tendela u  thomiwa  ha Khoro ya Lushaka nga ha GBVF (NCGBVF). Tshivhumbeo tshi  o kuvhanganya vhathu u mona na lushaka, kha mavundu na mivhuso yapo u rangaphan a na u tikedza thuso ya GBVF i  isaho tshanduko. Tshi  o dovha tsha vha na vhu ifhinduleli ha u thoma u shuma ha GBVF-NSP. 1.3 Khoro ya Lushaka nga ha GBVF i  o vhiga kha Muphuresidennde nga kha Minis a Vho Nkoana-Mashabane. Khabinethe yo dovha ya tendela u vhekanywa ha IMC  yo vhumbiwaho nga Minis a wa Mapholisa Vho Bheki Cele; Minista wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo ya Vhululamisi Vho Ronald Lamola; Minis a wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo Vho Senzo Mchunu; Minis a wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano Vho Lindiwe Zulu na Minis a Vho Nkoana-Mashabane sa mu anganyi.1.4 Khabinethe yo dovholola ndeme ya tshiha u tsha u  o a maga a dzhiwaho u fhelisa khakhathi dzi itelwaho u vhaisa mira o i re khomboni tshitshavhani tshashu. IMC yo  ewa ndaela ya u tshimbidza nga  avhanyedza kha u dzudzanya nga n ila kwao Khoro ya Lushaka nga ha  GBVF. Yo dovha ya  ewa ndaela ya u bvela phan a na u  o isisa khonadzeo ya u ita uri nzudzanyo ya zwiimiswa ya zwino  i vhe mulayo.  1.5 Khomishini ya Ndinganyiso ya Mbeu   sa tshiimiswa tshi tikedzaho dimokirasi i na mushumo wa ndayotewa wa u  u uwedza  honifho ya ndinganyiso ya mbeu na tsireledzo, mveledziso na tswikelo ya ndinganyiso ya mbeu   nayo i  o lavhelelwa u bvela phan a na u  ola tshifhinga tsho he na u vhea i o mvelaphan a ine ya khou itwa kha u thoma u shuma ha  GBVF-NSP.2. Mbekanyamushumo ya Mabindu  a vhuponi ha Mahayani na ha Tshikolobulasini  (TREP)2.1 Khabinethe yo tendela u thoma u shuma ha TREP nga kha Tshikwama tsha Mabindu a Tshikolobulasini. Hezwi zwi khou tshimbilelana na thusedzo ya zwa ikonomi na u khwa hisa na u alusa ikonomi dza mahayani na dza tshikolobulasini.2.2 Tshikwama tshi  o  etshedza thikhedzo na u khwa hisedza uri hu vhe tshivhindini tsha ikonomi yo  iimisaho yo khwa haho i elanaho na Modele wa Mveledziso wa Tshi iriki kha vhupo uvho.3. Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele wa Ndingo ya Lushaka wo Vusuludzwaho (NEPF) wa 2019-20243.1 Khabinethe yo tendela NEPF yo Vusuludzwaho ya 2019-2024 na Pulane ya Ndingo ya Lushaka ya  2020-2025, ine ya khwa hisa sisi eme ya ndingo nga ngomu kha muvhuso. Dzi  o khwa hisa n adzo ya muvhuso ya u thoma u shumisa Muhanga wa Pulane ya Vhu ali ya Themo ya Vhukati ya  2020-2024.   3.2 Ma walo o he a nga wanala nga kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa u Pulana, Tsedzuluso na Ndaulo ya Kushumele (www.dpme.gov.za).4. Tshi irathedzhi tsha  anzhe  a Tshipembepembeni4.1 Khabinethe yo tendela khan iso ya Tshi irathedzhi tsha  anzhe  a Tshipembepembeni u itela u wana vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha. Afrika Tshipembe ndi mu ango kha Tshipembepembeni wa mbekanyamushumo dza Tshipembepembeni dza dzitshaka dzi we dza 10. Mbekanyamushumo idzi dzo he dzi shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe.4.2 Tshi irathedzhi tshi dzinginya thikho  hanu:  (a) nyambedzano dza dzitshaka na tshumisano; (b) risetshe; (c) ndondolo na kushumisele kwo khwa haho; (d) mveledziso ya khaphasithi na vhupfumbudzi na (e) tsivhudzo ya vhathu. Tshi irathedzhi tshi shuma na kha sisi eme ya Pfano ya Tshipembepembeni.C. Milayotibe1. Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Vhuendi ha Badani ha Lushaka wa 20191.1 Khabinethe i tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Vhuendi ha Dzitshaka wa 2019 Phalamenndeni. Mulayotibe u dzinginya vhukati ha zwi we milayo ya n owetshumo ya zwikolo zwa u guda u reila na u dzinginya zwiimo zwo teaho zwine ngazwo vhagudi vha u reila vha fanela u funzwa.1.2 U dovha wa sedzana na tshan a nguvhoni na zwiito zwa vhua a kha vhupo ha vhuendi ha badani, u gonyisa nda iso kha avho vha kundelwaho u tevhedza milayo ya vhuendi; u thivhela u nwa halwa nga vhareili na u dzinginya mulayo wa nomboro dza mo oro wa lushaka.1.3 Mulayotibe u dovha wa dzinginya vhukoni ha maan a a Minis a wa Vhuendi na avho vha Mira o ya mavundu a Khorotshitumbe vha re na vhu ifhinduleli kha zwa vhuendi.2. Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndiliso ya Khuvhalo na Malwadze Mishumoni wa  20192.1 Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Ndiliso ya Khuvhalo dza mushumoni na Mulayotibe wa Khwinisedzo ya Malwadze wa 2019 Phalamenndeni.2.2 Mulayotibe u sedzana na khwiniso  dzo dzinginywaho kha Mulayo wa Ndiliso dza Khuvhalo na Malwadze Mushumoni  (COIDA), wa 1993 (Mulayo 130 wa 1993). Mulayotibe u engedzedza u katelwa ha khuvhalo na malwadze mushumoni kha vhashumi vha re khomboni vhe vha vha vho siiwa nn a khathihi na khwiniso ya mbuelo dza ndiliso kha vhashumi nga u angaredza.2.3 Mulayotibe zwa zwino u katela vhukati ha zwi we vhashumi vha mu ani kana vha hayani vha re nga fhasi ha khethekanyo ya vhashumi u itela mbuelo u ya nga COIDA ya 1993. U dovha wa dzinginya muhanga wa  hanganelo nga huswa na mbuedzedzo kha vhashumi vho lovhaho kana/na vho huvhalaho mushumoni.3. Muvhuso Wapo: Mulayotibe wa Khethekanyo ya Masipala wa  20203.1 Khabinethe yo tendela khan iso ya Muvhuso Wapo: Mulayotibe wa Khethekanyo ya Masipala wa 2020 u itela u wana vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha. Wa vhuya wa phasiswa lwa mulayo, u  o fhelisa Mulayo wa Khethekanyo ya Masipala wa, 1998, (Mulayo 27 wa 1998) une wa vha one zwino: wa Muvhuso Wapo.3.2 Mulayotibe u  etshedza vhukati ha zwi we, mathomo na mishumo ya Bodo ya Khethekanyo ya Masipala,  ho ea na maitele a wanulusa na u wanulusa nga huswa mikano ya masipala na mikano ya wadi khathihi na mathomo a Maan alanga a Dzikha hululo.D. Zwi khou  aho1.  wedzi wa Pfanelo dza Vhathu  1.1 Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha  o  etshedza mulaedza muhulwane kha vhu ambo ha zwihumbudzo zwa  uvha  a Pfanelo ya Vhathu  a Lushaka  a 2020 vhune ha  o farwa nga Mugivhela wa  a 21  hafamuhwe 2020 ngei  Tshitediamu tsha Mitambo tsha Colesberg ngei Devhula ha Kapa nga fhasi ha thero:  waha wa vhuthihi, mvusuludzo ya ikonomi ya matshilisano na u fha a lushaka. 1.2  uvha  a Pfanelo dza Vhathu Afrika Tshipembe  i na vhubvo ha o kha zwiwo zwo iteaho kale zwa Sharpeville (Gauteng) na Langa (Kapa Vhukovhela) nga  a 21  hafamuhwe 1960, he vhathu vha tshivhalo vha thuntshiwa vha vhulawa vha tshi khou lwela pfanelo dzavho dza vhuthu.1.3 Khabinethe i ita khuwelelo kha maAfrika Tshipembe u pembelela  uvha  a Pfanelo dza Vhathu na u  honifha avho vhe vha kumedza matshilo avho u itela uri ri e ri swikele mbofholowo ine ra khou bvela phan a na u  iphina ngayo  amusi.1.4 Mu we wa tsumbo ya murangaphan a o  ikumedzelaho ndi Vho Dokotela Alfred Bathini Xuma, mu we wa madokotela a zwa dzilafho a Vharema vha u tou thoma Afrika Tshipembe na Muphuresidennde wa kale wa  ihoro  a  Khongiresi ya Lushaka lwa maAfrika. Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho elelwa na u  honifha vhutshilo ha Vho Dokotela Xuma nga u  ivhadza Mbulungo ya Tshiofisi yo Khetheaho: Khethekanyo ya 1 ya u vhulungwa havho nga huswa u bva mavhi ani a Brixton ngei Johannesburg u iswa hayani he vha bebiwa hone ngei mu anani wa KwaManzana, Engcobo Vhubva uvha ha Kapa nga Swondaha yeneyi yo fhiraho.2. Madalo a Mushumo a Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa kha  Riphabu iki ya Congo2.1 Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha khou dzhenela Mu angano wa u Rwela ari Tshigwada tsha Vhukwamani nga ha Libya une wa khou vha hone ngei  Oyo, kha  Riphabuliki ya Congo nga  a 11 na 12  hafamuhwe 2020. Vho fhelekedzwa nga Minis a wa Vhushaka ha Dzitshaka na Tshumisano, Vho Dokotela Naledi Pandor, Minis a wa Vhupileli na Maswole vha Kale, Vho Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula na Minis a wa Tsireledzo ya Muvhuso, Vho Ayanda Dlodlo. 2.2 Muhulisei Vho Denis Sassou N Guesso, Muphuresidennde wa  Riphabuliki ya Congo, vho ramba Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa u dzhenela mu angano sa Mudzulatshidulo wa Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).2.3 Sesheni yo  oweleaho ya vhu33 ya Buthano  a AU yo dzhia tsheo ya u thoma ya Tshigwada tsha Vhukwamani, hune Riphabu iki ya Congo yo vha Mudzulatshidulo na u katela mira o ya Komiti ya  evele ya N ha nga ha Libya u  etshedza vhurangaphan a na u  u uwedza vhukonanyi ha ndingedzo dza dzitshaka kha u  o a thandululo kha Vilili  a  ibya.E. Milaedza ya Ndiliso1. Khabinethe yo rumela ndiliso kha mu a, dzikhonani na vhashumisani vha mu o isisi muhulwane wa Bodo ya Vhulanguli ha Vhu o isisi ha Mapholisa ho  iimisaho, Vho  Mandla Mahlangu (47), vhe vha vhulawa vhege yeneyi. Khabinethe i dovha ya rumela ndiliso kha mi a, dzikhonani na vhashumisani vha vhaofisiri vhavhili vha Hawks  Detective Warrant Officer Delene Grobelaar Koonin (44) na Sergeant Wynand Herbst (42), vhe vha vhulawa kha u thuntshana ngei Devhula Vhukovhela.2. Khabinethe i sasaladza mabulayo a vhaofisiri avha vhavhili vho  ikumedzelaho, vha re na mushumo wa u tsireledza maAfrika Tshipembe vho he. Sa lushaka, ri fanela u ima ro he ra sasaladza mabulayo a mapholisa vhashu vha vhanna na vhafumakadzi.F. Milaedza ya u FhululedzaKhabinethe i fhululedza na u tamela mashudu kha:1.1 Muphuresidennde o khethiwaho, Muhulisei Vho Faur  Essozimna Gnassingb , kha u khethiwa hafhu sa Muphuresidennde wa Riphabu iki ya Togo nga tshifhinga tsha Khetho dza Muphuresidennde dzo farwaho nga  a 22 Luhuhi 2020. Khabinethe i  anganela na Muphuresidennde  Vho Ramaphosa kha u dovha ya fhulufhedza vhathu vha Togo nga u tshimbidza khetho dza mulalo.G. U tholwaU tholwa ho he ho fhira kha khwa hisedzo ya ndalukano na thendelo yo teaho.1. Mira o ya Bodo ya Maan alanga a Vhutsireledzi ya Ma anzhe a Afrika Tshipembe:a. Vho Nthato Minyuku (Mudzulatshidulo).b. Vho Lindelwa Nonjabulo Dlaminic. Vho Lucas Haluodi;d. Vho Eva Dorothy Khosa; ande. Mukapu eni Vho Bheka Clive Zulu.Mbudziso:Vho Phumla WilliamsMuambeli wa Khabinethe o tou farelaho  Lu ingothedeleki: 083 501 0139

title: Tshi atamennde tsha Mu angano wa Khabinethe wo Khetheaho wa  avhuraru , 15 Lambamai 2020
text: Mu angano wa Khabinethe wo Khetheaho wo itwaho nga kha vidio wo farwa  amusi nga  avhuraru, 15 Lambamai 2020, u amba nga ha pulane ya mvusuludzo ya ikonomi na matshilisano nga murahu ha Nyiledza u bva mahayani ya Lushaka ya COVID-19.Hezwi zwi  a nga murahu ha n ivhadzo ye ya itwa nga Muphuresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vhege mbili dzo fhiraho, uri Khabinethe i  o vha na nyambedzano nga vhu alo ya u wana pulane ya mvusuludzo ya ikonomi ya shango.Mikumedzo mi anu yo  anganedzwa u bva kha dziki asita: Sekhithara dza zwa Ikonomi, Vhubindudzi, Mveledziso ya Themamveledziso na Mishumo; (2) Vhuvhusi, Mveledziso ya kha Zwiimiswa na Vhukoni ha Muvhuso; (3) Tsireledzo ya zwa Matshilisano, Mveledziso ya Vhathu na Tshitshavha; (4) Tshumisano na Dzitshaka, Vhutsireledzi na Mbambadzo; na (5) Vhulamukanyi, Thivhelo ya Vhugevhenga na Vhutsireledzi.Mikumedzo yo vha khuvhanganyo ya mushumo wo itwaho nga ki asi a dza Khabinethe dzo he, dzo sedza kha mvusuludzo ya ikonomi ya masiandaitwa a dwadze  a COVID-19 na u tsitselwa kha vhuimo ha fhasi ha Afrika Tshipembe zwenezwino nga madzhendedzi a u ela ikonomi a Moody na Fitch u ya nga u ralo.Khabinethe yo tshea uri dzi we nyambedzano na vhukwamani zwi kha  i  o ea phan a ha musi pulane yo  anganelaho ya u fhedzisela i tshi tendelwa uri i kovhelwe lushaka.Ki asi a dzo he dza Khabinethe dzo humbelwa uri dzi shumisane u itela u bveledza  i walo  o  anganelaho nga ha zwithu zwa ndemesa zwihulwane zwa pulane ya mvusuludzo ya ikonomi ya shango,  ine  a tea u khunyeledzwa phan a ha Mu angano wa Khabinethe  u tevhelaho wo dzudzanyelwaho u vha hone nga Musumbuluwo, 20 Lambamai 2020.Khabinethe yo dovha ya  ea ndaela Minis a wa Mabindu a Muvhuso Vho Pravin Gordhan uri vha dzudzanye muvhigo wa mafhungo maswa maswa nga ha South African Airways, u itela nyambedzano kha mu angano u khou  aho. Nga murahu, Khabinethe i  o khunyeledza pulane ya mvusuludzo ya ikonomi ya shango.Khabinethe i livhuwa vhathu vho he u mona na shango kha u dzula havho mahayani nga tshifhinga tsha nyiledza u bva mahayani.Mbudziso: Vho Phumla Williams   Muambeli wa Khabinethe o tou FarelahoLu ingothendeleki: 083 501 0139Datumu:  avhuraru, 15 Lambamai 2020

title: Tshi atamennde tsha Mu angano wa une wa farwa hu tshi khou shumiswa zwileludzi zwa thekhino odzhi wa Khabinethe wo farwaho nga  avhuraru,  a 27 Shundunthule 2020
text: 1. Vhulwadze ha Tshitzhili tsha Corona 2019 (COVID-19) kha  a Afrika Tshipembe1.1. Khabinethe yo nye ulelwa nga ha mawanwa a vhuvhudzisi ho itwaho nga Muphuresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa na madzangano o fhambanaho a tshitshavha, u itela u vhona uri mvelaphan a ya shango ya u bva kha  eve e 4 u ya kha  eve e 3 ya nyiledzo dza u tshimbila dza lushaka i na thikhedzo na makumedzwa a vhafarani vha matshilisano vho he.1.2. Vho fhelekedzwa nga Minis a dzo fhambanaho, vho  angana na tshitshavha, sekithara dza vhashumi na mabindu, Khoro ya Dzikereke ya Afrika Tshipembe; vhurangaphan a ha zwitshavha ha lutendo; Dzimeyara; Vhalangavundu; Madzangano a Muvhuso Wapo a Afrika Tshipembe, vhurangaphan a ha sialala na mahoro a polotiki o imelelwaho Phalamenndeni.   1.3. Khabinethe yo  anganedza mawanwa a vhuvhudzisi uvhu, e a vha o  an avhuwa lu vhuedzaho na u pulanwa ho khwinifhadzwaho kha u leludza ha nyiledzo nga zwi uku u ya kha  eve e 3 ine ya khou thoma nga  a 1 Fulwi 2020.  eve e iyi i  o katela u ya phan a ha  han avhuwo dza vhuitwa ha ikonomi na u sutulwa ha nyiledzo dza u tshimbila ha vhathu. I  o dovha ya konisa maAfrika Tshipembe vha swikaho mi ioni dza malo uri vha vhuyelele mishumoni.  1.4. Hu  o sedzeswa kha vhupo vhu na  phimo khulwanesa  dze dza engedza u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona. Mihasho ya mutakalo ya kha mavundu i  o thoma vhudzheneleli ha mutakalo ho  ikumedzelaho kha vhupo uvho nga kha u  ola ho khwa hisedzwaho, ndingo, na maga a u thivhela na u sendela kule na vhathu.1.5. Khabinethe yo ombedzela thikhedzo yayo ya vhuvhudzisi ha vhukateli ho itwaho nga Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa u bva tshe tshiimo tsha lushaka tsha tshiwo tsha thoma nga  a 15  hafamuhwe 2020.  Vhuvhudzisi uvhu ho ita uri sekithara dzo he dza tshitshavha dzi kone u shela mulenzhe kha u lwa na dzwadze  a Covid19, zwi tshidzaho matshilo na u tsireledza mishumo.1.6. Ndangulo ya thekhinikha a na kushumele kwa vhudzheneleli ha COVID-19 zwi khou tshimbidzwa nga Tshiimiswa tsha Vhu ali na Kushumele kwa  humano ya Lushaka (NATJOINTS) na Muhasho wa Mutakalo. NATJOINTS ndi tshiimiswa tsha pfananyo ya ndayo nnzhi dza muvhuso tsho itelwaho u langa thandela khulwane.1.7. NATJOINTS ya COVID-19 yo fha wa kha zwi irimu zwa mushumo zwi katelaho vhorasaintsi; vha ivhi kana vhomakone vha zwa mutakalo; vhorainzhiniara; vhaimeleli vha senthara dza Ndangulo ya Tshiwo tsha Lushaka; vhatsivhudzi vha zwa mulayo; vharangaphan a vha mazhendedzi a vhutsireledzi na u tevhedzelwa ha mulayo, na zwigwada zwi bvaho kha mihasho zwi vhumbaho zwigwada zwa ikonomi na matshilisano zwa Foramu ya Vhalanguli-Dzhenera a vha Afrika Tshipembe.1.8. NATJOINTS i  anganedza mivhigo u bva kha mihasho yo fhambanaho na u swikisedza makumedzwa kha Vhalanguli-Dzhenera a (dziDG) u itela u bveledza themendelo dzi  etshedzwaho kha Khoro ya Ndaela ya Lushaka ya Tshitzhili tsha Corona (NCCC).1.9. NCCC i dzhiela nzhele themendelo dza dziDG  na u ita themendelo dzayo yone i e kha Khabinethe hune makumedzwa, hu tshi katelwa ndangulo, dza tendelwa. Maitele aya a vhona uri Vhulanguli vhu dzhie tsheo dza vhukateli dzo tendelaniwaho na dzi katelaho. Zwo ralo, Khabinethe i hanedzana vhukuma na makumedzwa a si one a uri mira o yo  iimisaho ya Vhulanguli i na vhu ifhinduleli ha themendelo dzi bvaho kha NCCC kana tsheo dzo dzhiwaho nga Khabinethe.1.10. Khabinethe i humbela uri hu vhe na vhuthihi kha u shumisana nga sekithara dzo he dza tshitshavha kha u lwisana na swi a  ithihi  ire khombo,  a dwadze  a COVID-19.1.11. Khabinethe i livhuwa maAfrika Tshipembe vho he kha u  idzima vha tshi ya phan a na u pfesesa nga tshifhinga tsha nyiledzo ya u tshimbila hu na ndivho. Mulevho wa Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa wa tshiimo tsha lushaka tsha tshiwo u ya nga Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Tshiwo, 2002 (Mulayo 57 wa 2002) u shela mulenzhe lu vhonalaho kha u tshidza matshilo.1.12. Maga a vhufaredzi o khwa haho o ita uri hu vhe na u ongolowa na u fhungudzea huhulwane kha mudzedze wa u kavhiwa. Nyiledzo ya u tshimbila yo  ea Afrika Tshipembe tshifhinga na tshikhala tsha u vhea maga o teaho kha sekithara dza mutakalo dza phuraivethe na dza nnyi na nnyi hu u itela u shumana na u engedzea hu sa tinyei ha u kavhiwa.1.13. Khabinethe i isa phan a na u humbela maAfrika Tshipembe uri vha dzhie vhu ifhinduleli vhuhulwane nga vhone vha e ha u  itsireledza vhone vha e na u tsireledza vha we u itela u fhungudza u pha alala ha tshitzhili.1.14. Dziminis a u ya nga dziphothifo io nga u fhambana hadzo dzi  o vhekanyulula zwidodombedzwa kha nye ulo dza vhoramafhungo dzine dza  o farwa  amusi, nga  avhuna  a 28 Shundunthule na matshelo, nga  avhu anu  a 29 Shundunthule 2020.Tsheo dza Khabinethe2.1. U vha  emu i wa Tshi itshi tsha u  ola zwire kha Tshikhala tsha nn a ha  ifhasi2.1. Khabinethe yo tendela uri Zhendedzi  a Tshikhala  a Lushaka  a Afrika Tshipembe (SANSA)  i dzhene kha vhufarani na National Aeronautics na Vhulanguli ha Tshikhala uri zwi vhe  emu i wa tshi itshi tsha u  ola zwire kha Tshikhala tsha nn a ha  ifhasi. Tshi itshi, tshine tsha  o vha tshi Matjiesfontein ngei Kapa Vhukovhela, tshi  o tikedza mushumo wa zwifhufhi zwa muyani zwa vhathu zwi yaho  wedzini, kha Masase na u fhirisa.  2.2. Tshi  o  anganywa kha nethiweke ire hone ya saithi tharu dzire United States of America, Spain na Australia. Sa saithi ya vhuna, i  o engedza kha idzo tharu na u  etshedza mukatelo wo khwiniswaho na u sa shumiswa kha thikhedzo ya mushumo wa ndeme. SANSA i  o shumisa, u londota na u langa tshi itshi.2.3. Tshi itshi tshi  o vhuedza Afrika Tshipembe kha, vhukati ha zwi we, mveledziso ya zwikili zwi shayeaho na nyaluwo ya sekithara ya saintsi, inzhiniarini, thekhino odzhi na tshanduko. I  o dovha ya  etshedza zwikhala zwa u fusha ndivho ya ikonomi, na u engedza mveledzwa ya tsedzuluso ya lushaka kha saintsi ya Tshikhalani na thekhino odzhi.3. Mvetamveto ya N ivhadzamulayotibe kha Tshumelo dza Mulilo3.1. Khabinethe yo tendela Mvetamveto ya N ivhadzamulayotibe kha Tshumelo dza Mulilo. N ivhadzamulayotibe i sumbedzisa makumedzwa a ndeme a mbekanyamaitele ane a  o vha mutheo wa theo ya milayo ya tshumelo dza mulilo ine ya  o ima vhuimoni ha Mulayo wa Tshumelo dza Fire Brigade, 1987 (Mulayo 99 wa 1987).  3.2. I sumbedzisa mishumo na vhu ifhinduleli ha muvhuso wa lushaka na wa kha vundu kha u tikedza mimasipala. Kha u vhona uri tshumelo iyi i dzula i kha mudzedze wa n ila dza musalauno dza u langa zwiwo zwa mulilo i kumedza tshikhala tsha tsedzuluso na u kuvhanganywa ha data.3.3. Nga u angaredza, i dovha ya simesa u  ivhambedza na dzi we theo dza milayo dzo tendelaho u bva nga 1994 na dzi na vhushaka na muvhuso wapo. Vhuvhudzisi ho angalalaho ho itwa na vhafaramikovhe vho teaho na tshitshavha nga u angaredza.4. Mishumo mihulwane kha  eve e 34.1. Khabinethe yo tendela uri kha  eve e 3, ine ya  o thoma nga Musumbuluwo, wa  a 1 Fulwi 2020, i  o shumisa maele o  anganelaho a katelaho mi angano ya Khabinethe ya u tou  angana nga kha zwileludzi zwa thekhino odzhi.4.2. Khabinethe yo dovha ya tendela zwigwada zwa u  ola zwi katelaho Dziminis a na Vhafarisa Dziminis a. Vho iswa kha tshi we na tshi we tsha zwi iriki zwa 52 na dzi oroboni u  ola maga o vhewaho kha u lwa na u pha alala ha COVID-19.  U tholwaU tholwa ho he ho fhira kha khwa hisedzo ya ndalukano na thendelo yo teaho.1. Khoro ya Bodo ya Thekhino odzhi ya Minerala (MINTEK):Vho Dokotela Vanguard Mbuyiseli Mkosana (Mudzulatshidulo);Mufumakadzi Vho Ntokozo Faith Ngcwabe   Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Minerala na Fulufulu (DMRE);Vho Rantsadi Andries Moatshe (mu ha uli);Vho Dokotela Maropeng Walter Ngobeni;Vho Phurofesa Lindiwe Zungu;Vho Philippus Rudolf Heydenrich;Mufumakadzi Vho Pontsho Maruping;Vho Harold Motaung;Mufumakadzi Vho Phydelis Ntombifuthi Zikalala-Mvelase;Mufumakadzi Vho Margaret Mosibudi Phiri;Vho Lefadi Lucas Makibinyane; naVho Dokotela M Motuku.2. Khoro ya Bodo ya Geoscience:Vho Dokotela Humphrey Lawrence Mbendeni Mathe (Mudzulatshidulo);Vho Andries Moatshe (DMRE);Vho Dokotela Thuli Khumalo (Muhasho wa Mupo, Vhusimamiri na Vhureakhovhe);Vho Sanelo Malaza (mu ha uli);Mufumakadzi Vho Rosalind Mdubeki (Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Mahayani na Tshanduko ya Mavu);Mufumakadzi Vho Pontsho Tsotetsi (mu ha uli);Mufumakadzi Vho Deborah Mochothli (Muhasho wa Ma i na Vhuthathatshili);Vho Paul Nel (mu ha uli);Vho Dokotela Jennifer Mirembe;Vho Smunda Mokoena;Vho Xolisa Mvinjelwa (sekithara ya migodi);Vho Adv Ntika Maake;Mufumakadzi Vho Adila Chowan (sekithara ya khomese);Vho B Gerryts (Muhasho wa Saintsi na Tshanduko);Mufumakadzi Vho Lebogang Madiba (Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka); naVho Moses Mabuza   Muofisiri Mulanguli Muhulwane (CEO).3. Vhalanguli vha si vha ngomu kha Bodo ya Ndangulo ya Vhuimangalavha ha Afrika Tshipembe:Vho Zolani Kgosietsile Matthews (Mudzulatshidulo);Mufumakadzi Vho Siphokazi Matolengwe;Vho Asraf Mohamed Adam;Mufumakadzi Vho Leanda-Marsha Vilakazi;Mufumakadzi Vho Kenosi Selane;Vho Zola Fihlani;Vho Dokotela Tshisikawe Victor Munyama; naMufumakadzi Vho Zandile Kabini.4. Vho Abel Moffat SithoIe sa CEO wa Vhuandani ha Vhubindudzi ha Tshitshavha.5. Mufumakadzi Vho Phumla Williams sa DG wa Sisi eme ya Vhudavhidzani ha Muvhuso na Mafhungo (GCIS).Mbudziso: Mufumakadzi Vho Phumla Williams   Muambeli wa KhabinetheLu ingo: 083 501 0139

title: Statement on the Cabinet Meeting of 4 June 2020
text: Statement on the Virtual Cabinet Meeting held on Thursday, 4 June 2020 1. North High Court Judgment of Tuesday, 2 June 20201.1. A special virtual Cabinet meeting was held today, Thursday, 4 June 2020, to discuss developments in South Africa s efforts to save lives and protect livelihoods amid the COVID-19 pandemic. As part of this discussion, Cabinet reflected on the North Gauteng High Court judgment delivered by Justice Norman Davis on Tuesday, 2 June, 2020, which declared the COVID-19 lockdown regulations in levels 3 and 4 unconstitutional and invalid.1.2. After obtaining legal advice and listening to numerous comments made by members of the legal fraternity in reaction to the judgement, we are of the view that another court might come to a different conclusion on the matter.1.3. Cabinet has therefore decided to appeal the North Gauteng High court decision.1.4. Government will ask that its appeal be heard on an urgent basis so that it can obtain certainty on the regulations. The Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs, Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma will be joined in this appeal by President Cyril Ramaphosa and the Minister of Health, Dr Zweli Mkhize.1.5. Cabinet wishes to assure the nation that all interventions introduced since the declaration of a state of national disaster in March 2020 by President Cyril Ramaphosa have been directed primarily at saving lives.1.6. In implementing these interventions, government has consistently consulted all sectors of society, as the fight against COVID-19 is a national effort that requires unity in action between Government and all South Africans.1.7. While government appeals the court judgment, current regulations remain in force and we appeal and urge all our people to observe all the health protocols that have been put in place including washing of hands, social distancing, wearing of masks in public as well as screening and referral for testing where necessary.2. Extension of the National State of Disaster2.1  Cabinet approved the extension of the National State of Disaster by another month from the 15th June to 15 July 2020. The law allows for the National State of disaster to last  for 90 days which necessitates the extension .3. Western Cape COVID-19 infections3.1. Cabinet remains concerned about the intensity and increase of COVID-19 infections in the Western Cape. To this effect President Ramaphosa will undertake a visit to the province on Friday, 5 June 2020, to discuss the situation with Premier Alan Winde and the provincial executive, and to assess the province s readiness for continued management of the pandemic.   3.2. President Ramaphosa will be accompanied by the Minister Mkhize; Defence Minister Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula; Basic Education Minister Angie Motshekga; Police Minister Bheki Cele; Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation Minister Lindiwe Sisulu and Public Works and Infrastructure Minister Patricia de Lille.4.   Child Protection Week4.1.  Cabinet reminds the public that this week is Child Protection Week which started this past Sunday the 31 May and ends this coming Sunday 7 June 2020. Child Protection Week seeks to elevate issues of the protection of children throughout the year. This year s theme is:  Let Us All Protect Children, During COVID-19 and Beyond .5.   Water shortage5.1.    Cabinet has noted the recent drop in dam levels, particularly in the Western Cape.  As a water-scarce country, the dam levels have a negative impact on our water needs. Cabinet therefore makes an appeal to all of us to use water sparingly.Enquiries: Ms Phumla Williams   Cabinet SpokespersonCell: 083 501 0139

title: Tshi atamennde tsha nga ha Mu angano wa Khabinethe wo farwaho nga kha zwileludzi zwa thekhino odzhi nga  avhuraru, 10 Fulwi 2020
text: 1.  Maswa-Maswa a Tshitzhili tsha Corona (COVID-19)1.1.  Kha mu angano wayo wo farwaho nga kha zwileludzi zwa thekhino odzhi nga  avhuraru,  a 10 Fulwi 2020, Khabinethe yo  anganedza muvhigo wa maswa-maswa u bva kha Khoro ya Ndaela ya Lushaka ya Tshitzhili tsha Corona (NCCC). NCCC yo kumedza themendelo dza tshivhalo maelana na N ivhadzo yo livhanywaho ya khohakhombo yo engedzwaho ya  eve e 3 ya nyiledzo ya u tshimbila ya lushaka.Themendelo dzo tewa kha  etshedzo dzo itwaho nga sekithara dzo fhambanaho na khaseledzo nga Vhushumeli ho  anganelaho ha Lushaka na Tshiimiswa tsha Vhusevhi.  1.2.  Fhedziha, Khabinethe yo dzhia tsheo ya u vha yo imisa thendelo ya themendelo idzo nga uri hu tshe ho lindelwa muvhigo wo fhelelaho wa ndingo ya mutakalo u bva kha Komiti ya Ofisi ya Minis a ya Vhutsivhudzi ha zwa Mutakalo kha COVID-19. NCCC i khou lavhelela u  anganedza mukumedzelo wo fhelelaho mathomoni a vhege  aho.1.3.  Khabinethe i khou dovha hafhu ya humbela na u  u uwedza maAfrika Tshipembe vho he uri nga kha u  i etshedzela vha tevhedze maga o vheiwaho kha u lwa na u pha alala ha COVID-19. Maga ayo a katela u dzulela u  amba zwan a, u sa vha tsini-tsini na vha we na u ambara masiki musi u fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi.2.  Khamphani ya Phe iro iamu ya Lushaka2.1.  Khabinethe yo nye ulelwa nga ha mushumo une wa khou ya phan a wa u livhanya khamphani  hukhu dza pe iro iamu (oi i na gese) dzi langwaho nga khamphani ya muvhuso ya fulufulu o fhambanaho, ine ya vha Tshikwama tsha Vhukati tsha Fulufulu.   2.2.  Ndivhanyiso i  o bveledza mutikedzelo miraru (PetroSA, Strategic Fuel Fund na iGas) dzine dza  o  anganywa uri dzi vhe Khamphani ya Phe iro iamu ya Lushaka nthihi. Hezwi zwi khou vha hone nga kha n ivhadzo yo itwaho nga Muphuresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa kha Mulaedza wavho wa Lushaka wa  a 13 Luhuhi 2020, u itela u wana hafhu ndivho na u livhanyisa mabindu a langwaho nga muvhuso a tshivhalo u itela u tikedza nyaluwo na mvelaphan a.2.3.  Khabinethe yo tendela  ikumedzwa  a u thola khamphani ya phurofeshinala ya nzudzanyululo ire na vhukoni ha vhu anganyi u itela u sedzulusa modele wa n hesa u shumiseaho wa heyi Khamphani ya Phe iro iamu ya Lushaka nthihi.3.  Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele wa Khakhathi dzo Livhanaho na Mbeu (GBV) kha Sis eme ya Pfunzo ya Zwikolo zwa N ha na Vhupfumbudzi3.1.  Khabinethe yo tendela Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya GBV kha Sisi eme ya Pfunzo ya Zwikolo zwa N ha na Vhupfumbudzi. Muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele u khou  o a u fhindula kha tshivhalo tsho engedzeaho tsha milandu i elanaho ha GBV kha zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo ya n ha.     3.2.  Muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele u  etshedza ndededzo kha zwiimiswa, kushumele na maitele ane zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo ya n ha zwa tea u shumisa kha u thivhela zwiwo zwa GBV khamphasini dzavho. Hu tshi engedzwa kha u  etshedza zwiimiswa zwa vhulangi, zwi dovha zwa kombetshedza zwiimiswa izwo uri zwi ite uri mbekanyamaitele yazwo ya GBV i  ivhiwe.4.  Muvhigo wa Ngudo ya Vhukonadzei kha Khon ela na Miziamu wa Mbofholowo ya Tsudzuluwo (RLMM)4.1.  Khabinethe yo tendela Muvhigo wa Ngudo ya Vhukonadzei ha u thomiwa ha RLMM. Miziamu u  o shela mulenzhe kha u tsireledzwa ha  ivhazwakale ya khon ela nndwa ya mbofholowo Afrika Tshipembe.4.2.  Ngudo, ine Khabinethe yo i tendela nga 2015, yo vha yo laelwa kha nyimele ya ndaela ya Khon ela na N ila ya Mbofholowo Vhufa (RLHR).  RLHR i shela mulenzhe kha mvelaphan a na tshanduko ya vhufa ha mbono ya shango  a Afrika Tshipembe.4.3.  Musi wo no fhela, miziamu u  o tsireledza mutevhe wa e emennde dza vhufa (dzi fareaho na dzi sa farei) na u  etshedza nganea, nyelelwo na tshenzhemo i fanaho zwi elanaho na nndwa ya mbofholowo Afrika Tshipembe.5.  N ila ya Vhufa ha Lushaka lwa Khoi na San5.1.  Khabinethe yo tendela u thomiwa ha N ila ya Vhufa ha Lushaka lwa Khoi na San, ine ya vha thandela ya ifa  a lushaka. N ila iyi i  o topola, u  ea mavhalaangwe, u tsireledza na u khwinisa vhufa ha Khoi, Nama, Griekwa, Khorana na San. Thandela iyi i shela mulenzhe u ya kha u tendela ha  ivhazwakale ya Afrika Tshipembe ye ya vha yo litshedzelwa na u sa dzhielwa n ha.5.2.  Zwi dovha zwa ita uri Mulayo wa Vhurangaphan a ha Sialala  a Khoi-San wa 2019 (Mulayo 3 wa 2019) u shume, u itaho uri vharangaphan a vha sialala vha Khoi na San vha dzhielwe n ha.6.   Makolo a khoini dza khumbudzo dza 2021 na 20226.1.  Khabinethe yo tendela makolo a khoini dza khumbudzo ya pha aladzo dza 2021 na 2022 dzine dza bveledzwa nga Bannga ya Vhukati ya Afrika Tshipembe (SARB) na South African Mint Company.6.2.  Khoini ya pha aladzo ya khumbudzo ya R5 na R5 sterling-silver, khoini ya gold plated collectors  dzi  o bveledzwa nga 2021 hu tshi pembelelwa anivesari ya mi waha ya  ana (Centenary) ya SARB. Serisi ya vhu a ya khoini ya Desima a ya Afrika Tshipembe, ine ya  o bveledzwa nga 2022 i  o katela khoini ya sheleni (10 cent), thubobo (20 cent), tshi anu (50 cent), disheleni (R1), bonndo na bonndo mbili na disheleni (R2 na R5).   Milayotibe1.  Mulayotibe wa Khwinifhadzo ya Milayo ya Sekithara ya Masheleni wa 20201.1.  Khabinethe yo tendela mukumedzo wa Mulayotibe wa Khwinifhadzo ya Milayo ya Sekithara ya Masheleni wa 2020 Phalamenndeni. Mulayotibe u kumedza u vhea SARB sa Man alanga a Thandululo, na u engedza zwishumiswa zwa vhulauli ha SARB kha u bvisa maan a ayo a  o eaho kha u vhona uri hu na vhudziki kha sisi eme ya masheleni.1.2.  Mulayotibe u kumedza muhanga muswa wa thandululo kha zwiimiswa zwa masheleni, nga maan a dzibannga musi dzi tshi dzhena kha tshifhinga tsha mutsiko wa masheleni. U dovha wa  ivhadza kana u  isa tshikimu tsha ndindakhombo ya diphosithi khulwane tsha u tou thoma Afrika Tshipembe tshine tsha  o vhona uri vha dzhenisaho tshelede vha wana tshelede yavho murahu musi bannga itshi kundelwa.1.3.  Tshikimu itsho tshi  o tsireledza vhadzhenisi vha tshelede vha sa koni u  i lwela na u vhona uri u thithisea kha sis eme ya masheleni na ikonomi nga vhuphara hu si vhe vhunzhi musi zwiimiswa izwo zwi tshi dzhena kha mutsiko wa masheleni.U tholwaMufumakadzi Vho Sekgothadi Kabelo sa Mulanguli Muhulwane a si wa Ngomu wa Vhulangi ha Vhuimazwikepe ha Bodo ya Afrika Tshipembe. Mbudziso: Mufumakadzi Vho Phumla Williams   Muambeli wa KhabinetheLu ingo: 083 501 0139

title: Tshitatamende tsha Mu angano wa Khabinethe wo itwaho nga kha vidio wa  a 24 Fulwi 2020
text: 1. Pulane ya u Phulusa Bindu  a South African Airways (SAA) 1.1  Khabinethe yo  anganedza muvhigo wa mvelaphan a kha maitele a u phulusa bindu  a SAA u bva kha IMC ya SAA, ine mudzulatshidulo wayo ha vha Minista wa Mabindu a Muvhuso Vho Pravin Gordhan.1.2 Khabinethe i tshe yo fulufhela uri voutu yavhu i u bva kha vhakolodisi u khunyeledza maitele a u phulusa bindu i kha  i vha tsheo ire na khonadzeo ya u bvelela na i khauledzaho, uri bupo  a lushaka  i dzudzanye nga huswa kushumele kwa o ku katelaho zwa bindu  a o, tshikolodo tsha o na vhu we vhu ifhinduleli. Khabinethe i tenda uri bindu  a bupo  o dzudzanywaho nga huswa  i  o tevhela n ila ya tshanduko yo khwa haho u itela u bvelela ha dziphai otho dza vharema nga murahu ha mi waha ya 26 ya dimokirasi.  1.3 I tikedza  idzingi wa  a bupo  iswa na ndingedzo dzo khwa haho dza u kuvhanganya ndambedzo u bva kha zwiko zwo fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na u bva kha vhashumisani vhane vha nga vha na mikovhe kha bindu  ene i uri bupo  iswa  i thome u shuma. Heyi ndi yone n ila i konadzeaho ine bupo  iswa  i re na khonadzeo ya u bvelela,  o khwa haho,  i konaho u  a isana na ma we  a  o kona u  etshedza tshumelo dzo  anganelaho fhano hayani, kha madzingu na kha dzitshaka.2. Ikonomi2.1 Khabinethe i  anganedza mugaganyagwama wa dzudzanywaho wa u Engedzedza masheleni wa 2020/21 wo  etshedzwaho nga Minista wa Gwama Vho Tito Mboweni nga  avhuraru  a 24 Fulwi 2020. Hezwi zwo itiswa nga dwadze  a tshitzhili tsha Corona (COVID-19)  e  a vhanga u wa ha ikonomi. Mugaganyagwama wa u Engedzedza masheleni wo vhekanya n ila ine ya tea u tevhelwa kha u dzikisa tshikolodo nga u khwinisa maitele a u shumisa masheleni na u sika mutheo wa u vusuludza ikonomi.2.2 Khabinethe i na fulufhelo  a uri vhu ikumedzeli ho  ivhadzwaho nga Minista Vho Mboweni hu  o vhea ikonomi yashu kha n ila yo dziaho na i sa nye hi, nga maan a arali mu we na mu we a  anganela na muvhuso kha u vhu shumisa.3. Maswa maswa nga ha COVID-193.1 Khabinethe yo  anganedza muvhigo wa mvelaphan a u bva kha Khoro ya Ndaelo ya Lushaka ya tshitzhili tsha Corona. Sa tshipi a tsha u fhindula kha Lu a lwa 3 lwa khovhakhombo yo elwaho lwa nyiledza u bva mahayani ya lushaka, khwiniso ya milayo u ya nga Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Tshiwo, 2002 (Act 57 of 2002) yo  etshedzwa. 3.2 Musi Khabinethe i tshi livhuwa mushumo muhulwane vhukuma une wa kha  i itwa u  hogomela ndinganyiso vhukati ha n ila ine vhathu vha kona u  ishumela na u vhulunga matshilo, yo  anganedza u an adzwa ha khwiniso malugana na u vulwa ha dziristorente, dzihodela na dzikhasino.3.3  Khabinethe i ombedzela khuwelelo kha ri e ro he uri ri shumisane u fhelisa u pha alala ha vhulwadze zwitshavhani zwa hashu nga u tevhedza ndaela dza mutakalo u fana na u  amba zwan a tshifhinga tsho he, u vha kule na mu we muthu na u ambara masiki musi ri fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi.4. Khakhathi dzo  isendekaho nga Mbeu (GBV) 4.1  Khabinethe i khou vhilaedzwa vhukuma nga u gonya ha tshivhalo tsha milandu ya GBV u mona na shango. Nga murahu ha mabulayo a vhafumakadzi na vhana manzhi a zwenezwino, yo ita khuwelelo kha vhathu vho he vha Afrika Tshipembe uri vha vhumbane na u shumisana u fhelisa mabulayo aya. Khabinethe i kho a madzhendedzi a vhukombetshedzi ha mulayo kha u  avhanyedza hao a fara vhahumbulelwa na u dovha ya  u uwedza madzhendedzi u bvela phan a na u shuma a sa neti u fara vho he vho kwameaho kha mabulayo a tshi uhu aya.4.2 Khabinethe yo ima yo khwa hisa kha vhu ikumedzeli hayo ha u thoma u shumisa nga vhu alo thusedzo dza tshaka dzo fhambanaho dzo bveledziswaho u bva kha Pulane ya Tshi irathedzhi ya Lushaka nga ha GBV na Mabulayo a vha tshisadzini. Komiti ya Dziminista yo rangwaho phan a nga Minista u bva kha Ofisi ya Muphuresidennde ya zwa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali, Vho Maite Nkoana-Mashabane, i bvela phan a na u tshimbidza thusedzo ya muvhuso ya masia manzhi a muvhuso. Honeha, thusedzo i shumaho vhukuma i  o a Maafrika Tshipembe vho he u tamba tshipi a tshavho kha u fhelisa mvelele ya khakhathi dzi itelwaho mira o ya tshitshavha ine ya sa kone u  ilwela. 5. Simphoziamu ya Mveledziso ya Themamveledziso yo Khwa haho ya Afrika Tshipembe  (SIDSSA)5.1 Khabinethe i  anganedza u rwelwa  ari ha  SIDSSA ye ya itwa nga kha vidio vhege ino, nga fhasi ha thero:   u bindudza kha themamveledziso u itela lupfumo lwa vho he: zwino, matshelo na tshifhinga tshi  aho .  SIDSSA ndi pu atifomo ine ya  anganya vhashumi vha vhu hogwa kha tshikhala tsha vhubindudzi ha themamveledziso, vhane vha khou u tsa vha tshi gonya u lwela tshipikwa tsha u  avhanyisa  pulane ya u vusa ikonomi yo rangwaho phan a nga themamveledziso. Thusedzo ya themamveledziso i dzula i tshi isatshanduko kha phakhedzhi ya u vusuludza ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe.5.2  Nga kha maitele aya,  hanganyelo ya thandela dza 276 dzo no elwa.  Hezwi zwi vhumba thandela dza vhubindudzi ha themamveledziso dzi  isaho tshanduko dzi na vhukoni ha u andisa kha tsiko ya zwikhala zwa mushumo na u khwa hisa ikonomi.  5.3 Dza fumalomalo kha thandela idzi dzo lugela vhubindudzi nahone dzi katela n owetshumo dzine dzo khwa hisedzwa u vha na vhukoni ha u andisa kha sia  a fulufulu, ma i, zwiendedzi, themamveledziso ya thekhino odzhi ya vhudavhidzani na mafhungo; vhudzulo ha vhathu, vhulimi na n owetshumo ya zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi.5.4  Thandela idzi dzi  o lambedzwa zwihulwane u bva kha masia mararu   a zwa mabindu, ndambedzo ya masheleni yo  anganyiswaho na kha khovhelo ya muvhalelano. Sa tshipi a tsha phakhedzhi ya u vusa ikonomi, muya wa shango wa tshumisano ya muvhuso na phuraivethe zwi bvela phan a na u sedza kha u tandulula u sa lingana kha sia  a vhudzulo, u shandukisa ikonomi na u sika mishumo ine ya khou  o ea vhukuma.U tholwaU tholwa ho he hu  o itwa ho thoma ha khwa hisedzwa ndalukanyo dza vho tholwaho na u sedzwa arali vha si na milandu.1.     Mira o ya bodo ya Bodo ya Vhulangi yo  iimisaho ya Dzioditha:1.1.    Vho Martie Janse van Rensburg (vho tholiwa hafhu);1.2.    Vho Iqbal Motala (vho tholiwa hafhu);1.3.    Vho Madoda Petros (vho tholiwa hafhu);1.4.    Vho Nombulelo Gumata;1.5.    Vho Thembeka Semane;1.6.    Vho Roy Andersen;1.7.    Vho Preston Speckmann;1.8.    Vho Jesmane Boggenpoels;1.9.    Vho Shauket Fakie; and1.10     Muphurofesa Vho Nirupa Padia.2.    Mira o ya bodo ya Dzangano  a Ndindakhombo ya Khovhakhombo yo Khetheaho  a Afrika Tshipembe:2.1.    Vho Moss Ngoasheng (Mudzulatshidulo);2.2.    Vho Priscilla Mokonyane (Mufarisa Mudzulatshidulo);2.3.    Vho Moipone Ramoipone;2.4.    Vho Desmond Marumo;2.5.    Vho Japhtaline Mantuka Maisela;2.6.    Vho Christiaan Johannes van Dyk;2.7.    Vho Enos Ngutshane;2.8.    Vho Reginald Haman;2.9.    Vho Sathie Gounden;2.10.    Vho Margret Mosibudi Phiri;2.11.    Vho Refilwe Moletsane; and2.12.    Vho Nolwandile Mgoqi-Mbalo.Mbudziso:Vho Phumla Williams   Muambeli wa Khabinethe Lu ingothendeleki: 083 501 0139

title: Tshitatamennde tsha Mu angano wa Khabinethe nga vidio nga  avhuraru, 5  hangule 2020
text: A. U sedza fhungo  a Zwiito zwa Vhua a1. U shumiswa nga n ila i si yavhu i ha zwiko zwa thusedzo kha Vhulwadze ha tshitzhili tsha Corona (COVID-19)1.1. Khabinethe yo sedza nga  honi vhukuma mivhigo ya zwenezwino ya zwiito zwa vhua a na vhuvhava ha zwiko zwi  o eaho vhukuma zwe muvhuso wa zwi  etshedza u vhulunga na u  hogomela matshilo a vhathu nga tshifhinga tsha tshiwo tsha dwadze  a COVID-19.1.2. Vhathu vha si na mikhwa na dzikhamphani vho phusukanya zwiko zwa muvhuso zwe zwa vha zwo itelwa u  etshedza zwi iwa kha mi a i shayaho na tshomedzo dza u  itsireledza (dziPPE) dza vhashumi vha  etshedzaho tshumelo dza mutheo, nga maan a vhashumeli vha zwa mutakalo.  1.3. Vhugevhenga ho raliho na zwiito zwo bvaho nn a ha n ila zwi katela zwiito zwa u ta mitengo yo kalulaho, u khakhisa na u khelusa n isedzo dza zwi iwa zwo dzudzanyelwa u kovhelwa vhashai, na zwiito zwa vhufhura zwi kwamaho masheleni o livhiswaho kha u fhungudza vhuleme ya vhashumi na mabindu o kwameaho nga u valwa ha mishumo ya zwa ikonomi nga tshifhinga tsha nyiledza u bva mahayani. 1.4. Khabinethe i ita khuwelelo kha zwiimiswa zwa tshitshavha zwo he u tevhedza maimo a n hesa a vhungoho na vhu ifhinduleli, na u bveledza ndaela dzavho nga n ila i shumaho na vhukoni. Khabinethe i dzula yo  ikumedzela u fha a muvhuso wa mveledziso ya vhukoni na mikhwa yavhu i. I tikedza khuwelelo ya zwenezwino nga Muphuresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ya uri madzhendedzi a vhukombetshedzi ha mulayo a ite zwine a kona u fara avho vha kwameaho kha zwiito zwa vhua a, hu si na ndavha uri ndi vhonnyi na u khwa hisedza uri vha wana murahu masheleni o phusukanywaho.1.5. Muvhuso u bva kha mi waha yo fhira wo thoma thusedzo dzo fhambanaho dza u lwa na u hulela ha zwiito zwa vhua a, zwe zwa kwama nga n ila i si yavhu i n isedzo ya tshumelo kha vhashai na vha sa kone u  ilwela. 1.6. Senthara ya vhukonanyi yo khetheaho yo thomiwaho zwenezwino yo itelwa u khwa hisa ndingedzo dzo vho he vhukati ha madzhendedzi a vhukombetshedzi ha mulayo u thivhela, u topola, u  o isisa na u tshutshisa zwiito zwa vhua a zwi elanaho na COVID-19. Yo vhumbwa nga Senthara ya Vhusevhi ha zwa Masheleni, Bodo ya Vhulanguli ya Vhu o isisi ha Mapholisa yo Imaho nga Yo he; Maan alanga a Vhutshutshisi a Lushaka; Bodo ya Vhulanguli ya Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe ya  ho isiso ya Vhugevhenga vhu Itelwaho Muvhuso (Hawks), Vhusevhi ha Vhugevhenga na Tshumelo ya Vhu o isisi; Tshumelo ya Mbuelo ya Afrika Tshipembe; Yuniti yo U  o isisa yo Khetheaho (SIU) na Dzhendedzi  a Tsireledzo  a Muvhuso.1.7. Mavharivhari a zwiito zwa vhua a ane a khou  o isiswa hu katelwa vhufhura kha khovhelo ya zwiputu zwa zwi iwa, mindende ya thusedzo ya matshilisano, thengo ya dziPPE na dzi we  etshedzo dza zwa dzilafho, na u phusukanywa ha Tshikwama tsha COVID- 19 tsha Vhashumi tsha Tshifhinga nyana/Tshikimu tsha Thusedzo ya Vhatholi.  1.8. U  avhanyisa na u khwa hisa maitele a u lwa na zwiito zwa vhua a, Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa zwenezwino vho saina ndaela ya tshiofisi ya u  ea maan a SIU u  o isisa vhu ifari ho songo teaho kana hu siho mulayoni vhu we na vhu we kha thengo ya ndaka i we na i we, mishumo na tshumelo nga tshifhinga kana i elanaho na tshiimo tsha lushaka tsha tshiwo kha tshiimiswa tshi we na tshi we.SIU yo man afhadzwa u  o isisa mavharivhari ma we na ma we a elanaho na kushumisele ku si kwavhu i kwa masheleni a COVID-19 kha madavhi o he a Muvhuso na u thoma matshimbidzele a kombetshedzaho mulayo u itela u wana murahu tshinyalelo kana ndozwo i we na i we yo vha ho hone kha Muvhuso.U khwa hisedza uri vhukando vhu khou dzhiwa nga u  avhanyedza,Muphuresidennde vha  o  anganedza mivhigo ya tshifhinga nyana nga ha  ho isiso vhege dza rathi dzi we na dzi we. Vha  o dovha vha wana mivhigo u bva kha Foramu ya U lwa na Zwiito zwa Vhua a ya Sekhithara ya Mutakalo ye ya  ewa mushumo wa u  o isisa zwiito zwi siho ngonani na kushumisele kwa ndaulo ku si kwavhu i kha sekhithara ya mutakalo.1.9. Khabinethe yo dovha ya  anganedza khwiniso kha milayo ya mathomo ya Khomishini ya  ho isiso kha Mavharivhari a u Thubiwa ha Muvhuso, Zwiito zwa Vhua a na Vhufhura kha Sekhithara ya Tshitshavha, hu tshi katelwa na Madavhi a Muvhuso. Milayo yo khwiniswaho zwa zwino i  o tendela u kovhelana mafhungo nga khomishini na ma we madzhendedzi a vhukombetshedzi ha mulayo. Hezwi zwi  o thusa u  avhanyisa  ho isiso na tshutshiso ya milandu i elanaho na zwiito zwa vhua a.1.10. Sa tshipi a tsha u khwa hisa thusedzo idzi, Khabinethe yo dovha ya tendela u vhumbwa ha thimu ya Minista  hanu, vhukati ha zwi we, i  o sedza kha thengo dzo he dzi elanaho na COVID-19 dze dza itwa nga tshifhinga tsha nyiledza u bva mahayani na u khwa hisa sisi eme dza thengo dza zwino. Thimu i  o vhumbwa nga Minista wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi, Vho Ronald Lamola (Murambi); Minista wa Gwama, Vho Tito Mboweni, Minista wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo, Vho Senzo Mchunu, Minista wa Vhuvhusi ha Tshumisano na zwa Sialala, Dokotela Vho Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma na Minista kha Ofisi ya Muphuresidennde , Vho Jackson Mthembu.1.11. Mihasho yo he ya muvhuso i  o lavhelelwa u rumela thimu ya dziminista iyi khon hiraka dza thengo dzo he dzo pfufhiwaho nga tshifhinga itshi uri dzi an adzwe na uri tshitshavha tshi kone u dzi wana.1.12. Khabinethe i  anganedza n ivhadzo ya uri milandu i swikaho 36 i elanaho na zwiito zwa vhua a i kha maga o fhambanaho a  ho isiso na u tshutshiwa. Milandu iyi i rumela mulaedza wo khwa haho wa uri muvhuso a u nga  o kon elela zwiito zwi we na zwi we zwa vhua a, nga maan a kha vhashumi vhawo, na uri vhatshinyi vha  o farwa na u tshutshiswa.1.13. Zwiito zwa vhua a ndi vhugevhenga vhuhulwane vhukuma vhune ha  angula vhashai na u hanela u wana tshumelo dza mutheo. Sa tshitshavha, ri na vhu ifhinduleli ha u lwa na zwiito zwa vhua a nahone ri fanela u vhu bvisela khagala hu si na nyofho na u dzhia sia. Khabinethe i  u uwedza tshitshavha u shumisa  hingo thwii dza u lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga dza lushaka na dza sekhithara dzo fhambanaho dzo sikwaho u tikedza ndingedzo dza u bvisela khagala na u sala murahu mavharivhari a elanaho na zwiito zwa vhua a.B. Tsheo Khulwane    2. Tshi irathedzhi tsha Zwikili zwa Tshifhinga tshi  aho na Didzhithala tsha Lushaka2.1. Khabinethe yo  anganedza khan iso ya Tshi irathedzhi tsha Zwikili zwa Tshifhinga tshi  aho na Didzhithala tsha Lushaka. Tshi irathedzhi ndi mvelelo ya Muvhigo wa Muvhuso nga ha Thekhino odzhi na Mafhungo o  anganelaho zwa Lushaka we wa gan iswa nga Khubvumedzi  2016.  2.2. Tshi irathedzhi tshi fhindula kha muhanga wo konanywaho u bveledzisa khaphasithi ya zwikili zwa sekhithara dzo he dza ikonomi kha sia  a tshanduko ya didzhithala na mveledziso ya zwa thekhino odzhi zwa Tshanduko kha zwa N owetshumo ya Vhu a. Tshi  o  etshedza maitele a u thoma shuma a  hanganelo na a tshifhinga tshi  aho ane a  o katela sekhithara ya phuraivethe, zwa pfunzo na tshitshavha nga u angaredza.3. Tshi irathedzhi tsha Vhu owedzi ha Tshanduko ya Kilima tsha Lushaka (NCCAS)3.1. Khabinethe yo  anganedza NCCAS uri tshi thome u shumiswa. Tshi irathedzhi itshi tshi shuma sa Pulane ya Vhu owedzi ya Lushaka sa zwine zwa  o wa nga Buthano  a Muhanga wa Mashango Mbumbano nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima. Tshi irathedzhi tsha Vhu owedzi tsha Tshanduko ya Kilima tsha Lushaka (NCCAS) tshi sumbedzisa tshigwada tsha zwipikwa, thusedzo na mvelelo zwi ita uri shango  i sumbedze mbonalo ya vhu ikumedzeli ha Afrika Tshipembe kha Thendelano ya Paris nga ha tshanduko ya kilima.3.2. Tshi irathedzhi tshe tsha bveledziswa nga vhukwamani na muvhuso, sekhithara ya phuraivethe na zwitshavha zwapo tsho livhiswa kha u fhungudza u vha khomboni ha tshitshavha, ikonomi na mupo kha tshinyadzo ya tshanduko ya kilima. Tshi dovha tsha  etshedza maitele o konanywaho na o  anganelaho kha vhulanguli ha maga a vhu owedzi sa phindulo kha masiandaitwa a tshanduko ya mupo. Zwino ngauri tsho  anganedzwa, Muhasho wa Mupo, Ma aka na Vhureakhovhe u  o konanya  evele dzo he dza muvhuso, mabindu na tshitshavha tsha vhadzulapo u itela u thoma u tshi shumisa. Pulane ya mi waha ya   i  o sedzuluswa kha mi waha mi anu mi we na mu we.4. Vhu ambo ha u pembela  wedzi wa Vhafumakadzi,  hangule  20204.1. Khabinethe yo tendela mbekanyamushumo ya  vhu ambo ha u pembela  wedzi wa Vhafumakadzi nga fhasi ha thero:   U swikela pfanelo dza vhafumakadzi u itela vhumatshelo vhu linganaho:   wedzi wa Vhafumakadzi  waha uno u sedza u  u uwedza vhathu u dzhia vhukando ha u rangaphan a pfanelo dza vhafumakadzi na ndinganyiso ya mbeu. 4.2. Muvhuso wo  ikumedzela u lwa na u fhelisa khakhathi dzo  itikaho nga mbeu na mabulayo a vhafumakadzi (GBVF). Khabinethe vhege ino yo tendela Milayotibe miraru uri i rumelwe Phalamenndeni, ine ya  o khwa hisa sisi eme ya vhulamukanyi yashu u tikedza na u tsireledza zwipondwa zwa  GBVF.4.3. Mbekanyamushumo dza  wedzi yo he dzi  o engedza fulo  a vhafumakadzi na u khwa hisa zwigwada zwo dzudzanyiwaho zwa vhafumakadzi u ya kha n ila yo khwa haho ya nyito  kha mafhungo a vha kwamaho. Nga Swondaha, 9  hangule 2020, Muphuresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha  o dzhenela mushumo une wa  o hashiwa kha the evishini shango  o he, khathihi na phanele dza zwiambi vho rambiwaho.C. Milayotibe5. Milayotibe ya GBVF yo tendiwaho5.1. Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Milayotibe GBV miraru   Mulayo wa zwa Vhugevhenga (Vhutshinyi ha zwa Vhudzekani na Mafhungo a Elanaho) Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa 2020; Ridzhisi ara ya Lushaka ya Vhutshinyi ha zwa Vhudzekani) na Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Khakhathi ya Mi ani Phalamennde. Milayotibe iyi i fhindula tshivhalo tsha thaidzo dzo  ahiswaho nga tshifhinga tsha Samithi ya Muphuresidennde ya U lwa na  GBVF ye ya farwa nga 2018 malugana na sisi eme ya vhulamukanyi ha zwa vhugevhenga.  5.2. Khwiniso dzi  etshedza phindulo dzo livhanaho fhedzi na  ho ea na mbilaelo dza tshipondwa kha sisi eme ya vhulamukanyi ha zwa vhugevhenga malugana na vhutshinyi ha zwa vhudzekani. U kon isa milayo ya bei i kha vhatshinyi malugana na vhutshinyi ha zwa vhudzekani.  i walo  a mulayo  a u fara muthu a  i tsha  o vha  ho ea phan a ha musi madzhendedzi a vhukombetshedzi ha mulayo vha tshi dzhia vhukando kha vhugevhenga ha zwa vhudzekani ho vhigwaho. Milayo ya parolo na yone i khou khwa hiswa na zwigwevho zwa fhasisa zwi khou gonyiswa. Khwiniso dzi dovha dza khwa hisa masiandaitwa a u pfuka ndaela ya tsireledzo.5.3. Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Mulayo wa zwa Vhugevhenga (Vhutshinyi ha zwa Vhudzekani na Ma we a Elanaho) u dovha wa khwinisa Ridzhisi ara ya Lushaka ya Vhatshinyi vha Vhudzekani nga u  an avhudza tshikoupu u bva kha vhana na vhathu vho khakhiseaho muhumbuloni fhedzi, wa u engedza u tsireledza zwigwada zwo he zwi re khomboni. Vhathu vha re kha ridzhisi ara iyi vha kombetshedzea u bvisela khagala mafhungo aya musi vha tshi rumela khumbelo ya u shuma na zwigwada izwi.5.4. Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Khakhathi dza Mi ani u tshimbidza u wanwa ha ndaela dza tsireledzo kha zwiito zwa khakhathi dza mi ani nga kha maitele a e eki hironiki. U kombetshedza Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano na Muhasho wa Mutakalo u  etshedza dzi we tshumelo kha zwipondwa zwa khakhathi dza mi ani na u livhanyisa mbetshelwa dza Mulayo wa Khakhathi dza Mi ani, 1998 (Mulayo wa 116 wa 1998) na mbetshelwa dza Tsireledzo u bva kha Mulayo wa Tshutshedzo, 2011 (Mulayo wa 17 wa 2011).6. Mulayotibe wa U shumisa Mbanzhe u itela Muthu ene Mu e wa 20206.1. Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa Mulayotibe wa U shumisa Mbanzhe u itela Muthu ene Mu e wa 2020 Phalamenndeni uri u bveledziswe. Mulayotibe u  anganedza kha hulo ya Khothe ya Ndayotewa ye ya  ivhadzwa uri zwi we zwipi a zwa Mulayo wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na U rengiswa hu Siho Mulayoni ha Zwidzidzivhadzi, wa 1992 (Mulayo wa 140 wa 1992)  na Mulayo wa Ndaulo ya Zwidzidzivhadzi zwi Elanaho na Mishonga, 1965 (Mulayo wa 101 wa 1965) a zwi tevhedzi ndayotewa 6.2. Kha hulo yo  o imiswa lwa mi wedzi ya 24 u tendela Phalamennde uri i khakhulule khethekanyo dzenedzo. Mulayotibe uyu u langa kushumisele na u kufarele kwa mbanzhe na u  avhiwa ha miri ya mbanzhe nga mualuwa u itela u i shumisela ene mu e. U  etshedza mpimo wa vhunzhi ha mbanzhe dzine mualuwa a nga vha nadzo na u ita uri u daha mbanzhe fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi hu vhe mulandu.           7. Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Masheleni wa 20177.1. Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe Phalamenndeni. Mulayotibe u khou lingedza u  alutshedza Mulayo wa U Kuvhanganya Masheleni, , 1978 (Mulayo 107 wa 1978), nga u  anganyisa zwikwama zwiraru zwine zwa vha hone   Tshikwama tsha Thusedzo ya Tshiwo, Tshikwama tsha Mmbi ya Vhupileli ya Afrika Tshipembe na Tshikwama tsha Thusedzo ya Tshavhi   zwa vha Tshikwama tsha Thusedzo na Mveledziso ya Matshilisano tsha Lushaka tshithihi.7.2. Nga murahu tshikwama tshi  o sedza kha phungudzo ya vhuleme ha zwiwo nga u zwi langa phan a ha musi zwi tshi bvelela na u  u uwedza mveledziso ya matshilisano ya zwitshavha.. Tshikwama tsho  anganyisaho zwo he tshi  o thusa kha tshimbidza zwavhu i maitele a zwa ndaulo, na u ita uri hu vhe na tshumelo dza vhukoni kha zwitshavha zwi shayaho na u fhungudza mbadelo. Tshi  o  anganyisa bodo tharu dza vha bodo nthihi.D. U tholwaU tholwa ho he hu  o itwa ho thoma ha khwa hisedzwa ndalukanyo dza vho tholwaho na u sedzwa arali vha si na milandu.8.1. Tshumelo ya Mapholisa a Afrika Tshipembea. Mubirigadia Vho Ebrahim Ahmed Kadwa    hoho ya Vundu  a Gauteng: Bodo ya Vhulanguli ya  ho isiso ya Vhugevhenga vhu Itelwaho Muvhuso (DPCI); nab. Mubirigadia Vho Moiki Obed Ngwenya    hoho ya Vundu  a Kapa Vhubva uvha: DPCI.8.2. Vho Collins Letsoalo   Mofosiri Mutshimbidzi Muhulwane (CEO) wa Tshikwama tsha Khombo dza Badani 8.3. Mira o i si tshipi a tsha vhulanguli kha Bodo ya Dzhendedzi  a zwa Vhupfukandaela ya Milayo ya Vhuendi ha Badani:a. Vho Bongekile Zulu (Mudzulatshidulo);b. Vho Tshikane Owen Mtsetweni;c. Vho Dokotela Prittish Dala;d. Vho Dorcas Khosa-Shikwambana; nae. Vho Bonolo Molemo Ramokhele.8.4. Vhalangi vha si mira o ya vhulanguli kha Bodo ya Afrika Tshipembe ya Khamphani ya Vhukavhamabupo:a. Vho Dudu Hlatshwayo; nab. Vho Dokotela Kgabo Badimo.8.5. Mira o i si tshipi a tsha vhulanguli kha Bodo ya Ndango ya Vhutsireledzi  ha Ra iwei:a. Vho Boy Johannes Nobunga; (Mudzulatshidulo);b. Vho Yongama Pamla (Mufarisa Mudzulatshidulo );c. Vho Sisa Lunga Mtwa;d. Mueletshedzi Vho Nokuzola Gloria Khumalo;e. Vho Nompumelelo Ekeke;f. Vho Dineo Mathibedi;g. Vho Salome Chiloane-Nwabueze;h. Mueletshedzi Vho Frans Johannes van der Westhuizen; nai. Mueletshedzi Johannes Collen Weapond.8.6. Vho Khathutshelo Ramukumba   Muofisiri wa zwa Masheleni Muhulwane wa Poswo ya Afrika Tshipembe.8.7. Vho Mlamli Booi   CEO wa SENTECH SOC Limited (Vho tholwa hafhu). 8.8. Vho Dokotela Mzubanzi Bismark Tyobeka   CEO wa Tshiimiswa tsha Ndaulo ya Nyuki ia tsha Lushaka (Vho tholwa hafhu).8.9. Bodo ya Tshiimiswa tsha Ndaulo ya Nyuki ia tsha Lushaka:c. Vho Thapelo Motshudi (Mudzulatshidulo);d. Vho Dineo Peta (Mufarisa Mudzulatshidulo);e. Vho Protas Phili;f. Vho Devinagie Bendeman;g. Vho Dokotela Nomusa Qunta;h. Vho Bernard Pelei Petlane;i. Vho David Mamphitha; andj. Vho Lindelwa Dlamini.8.10. Bodo ya Vhalangi kha National Radioactive Waste Disposal Institute:a. Vho Thandeka Zungu (Mudzulatshidulo);b. Vho Mogwera Khoathane (Mufarisa Mudzulatshidulo);c. Vho Dokotela Kgaugelo Chiloane;d. Vho Cornelius Ruiters;e. Vho Leandra Vilakazi;f. Vho Lerato Makgae (Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Minerala na Fulufulu); nag. Vho Trevor Mark Gordon (Muhasho wa Mupo, zwa Ma aka na Vhureakhovhe).8.11. Nyengedzedzo: Tshifhinga tsha Ofisi tsha Bodo ya Vhalangi vha Dzhendedzi  a Masheleni a Mabindu Ma uku.:a. Vho AM Mahosi (Mudzulatshidulo);b. Vho M Radebe (Mufarisa Mudzulatshidulo);c. Vho J Kganyago;d. Vho N Dlamini;e. Vho NR Mlonzi;f. Vho DL Mabuza;g. Vho M Makara; nah. Muimeli wa Koporasi ya Mveledziso ya zwa N owetshumo.8.12. Vho Mlindi Mashologu   Mufarisa Mulangi Muhulwane (DDG):  Mveledziso ya Tshitshavha tsha Mafhungo,  ho iso, Muhasho  wa Vhudavhidzani na Thekhino odzhi dza Didzhithala.  8.13. Vho Thabitha Constance Mametja   DDG: Tshumelo dza Khamphani khulwane, Muhasho wa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Ndayotewa .Mbudziso:Vho Phumla Williams   Muambeli wa KhabinetheLu ingothendeleki: 083 501 0139

title: Tshitatamennde tsha Mu angano wa Khabinethe wo itwaho nga kha vidio wa  avhuraru, 26  hangule 2020
text: A.    Mafhungo a zwino kha shango1.    Levele ya Vhuvhili ya Tsivhudzo kha Vhulwadze ha tshitzhili tsha Corona (COVID-19)1.1.    Tsheo ya u bva kha  evele ya Vhuraru ya Tsivhudzo u ya kha  evele ya Vhuvhili ya Tsivhudzo  ya nyiledzo dza u tshimbila u thoma nga  a 18  hangule 2020 yo bveledza u  anganedzwa ha phungudzo dza nyiledzo kha mi we mishumo ya zwa ikonomi na matshilisano. Tshiimo tsha tshanduko itshi tshi  o vusa ikonomi yashu na u shela mulenzhe kha tsiko ya mishumo ine ya khou  o ea vhukuma, nga maan a kha n owetshumo ya vhuendelamashango na zwa mafunda. 1.2.     evele ya Vhuvhili ya Tsivhudzo i  o ita uri Dziminista dzi kone u  a kha nn u mbili dza Phalamennde, ya Buthano  a Lushaka na ya Khoro ya Lushaka ya Mavundu, hune vhukati ha zwi we, vha  o fhindula mbudziso u bva kha Mira o ya Phalamennde.1.3.    Musi  gabelo  a vhuvhili   a vhulwadze  e  a tshenzhemiwa nga mashango o vhalaho  i tshi tou vha khonadzeo ine ya dzula i hone, nyito dzashu ro he kha dzivhege na mi wedzi zwi  aho dzi nga thivhela izwo uri zwi bvelele, nahone zwi  o sumbedza uri ri  o bvela phan a hani nga u  avhanyedza. Khabinethe i ita khuwelelo kha mu we na mu we u dzhia maga a tsireledzo mahulwane vhukuma, u tevhedza mikhwa ire na vhu ifhinduleli na u ita zwithu zwa vhukuma u itela uri ri tinye u gonya hafhu ha vha kavhiwaho nga vhulwadze.  1.4.    Muvhuso u khou shumisana na vhashumisani vha tshitshavha na zwitshavha u khwa hisedza uri zwi iriki zwi na zwiko zwo e anaho na u dzudzanywa u itela u langa u pha alala ha vairasi.     1.5.    Lushaka lwashu lwo swikela zwihulwane vhukuma kha u lwa na tshiwo tsha dwadze. Mishumo yavhu i yashu, mashudu mavhi, i khou nyadziwa nga zwiito zwa u sa londa zwa vha we vhathu vhane vha khou hana u dzhia vhu ifhinduleli ha vhone vha e u thivhela u pha alala ha vairasi. Avho vhane vha khou reila vho kambiwa na u zwiito zwa u sa londa vha khou dzhenisa khomboni matshilo a vhathu vha si na mulandu.1.6.    Nga vhanga  a mikhwa ya u sa londa, vhege ino ri maliloni nga lufu lwe lwa vha lu songo lavhelelwa lwa vhaofisiri vha Muhasho wa Mapholisa wa  orobo khulwane ya Tswane vhe vha lozwa matshilo avho kha khombo ya mo oro ya ma isambilu na mureili we a vha o kambiwa mafheloni a vhege yo fhiraho. Khombo i shushaho iyi i tou vha mvulama o kha ri e ro he, nga muthihi nga muthihi na lushaka lwo he, u sedza kha uri ndi zwifhio zwine ra nga ita u thoma u vha na vhu ifhinduleli na u tamba tshipi a tshashu u fhelisa vhudakwa.1.7.    Khabinethe i  u uwedza vhathu vho he Afrika Tshipembe u isa phan a na u tevhedza ndaelo dzo tiwaho dza mutakalo na nga tshifhinga tsha  evele ya Vhuvhili ya Tsivhudzo. Ri fanela u tevehdza maitele a u vha kule na mu we muthu, u ambara masiki musi ri fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi na u  amba zwan a tshifhinga tsho he nga ma i na tshisibe kana ra shumisa sanithaiza dza zwan a dzi re na a ikhoho o.2.    U humela tshikoloni na zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo ya n ha2.1.    Khabinethe yo  anganedza u vulwa hafhu ha zwikolo zwa phuraimari na sekondari nga fhasi ha Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Mutheo nga Musumbuluwo uyu wo fhiraho. Vhagudi vha Gireidi dza 6 na 11 vho humela ki asini nga Musumbuluwo ngeno vhagudi vha Gireidi dza 7 na 12 vho humela ki asini nga  wedzi wo fhiraho nga murahu ha u vala lwa tshifhinga nyana ha zwikolo u thivhela khonadzeo ya u pha alala ha COVID-19.2.2.    Khabinethe yo  anganedza n ivhadzo ya uri nga fhasi ha nyiledzo ya u tshimbila kha  evele ya Vhuvhili ya Tsivhudzo, yunivesithi dzo he dzi  o tendelwa u  anganedza nga maitele a langwaho matshudeni vhane vha  o wana pfunzo nga ngomu khemphasini zwi tshi elana na  ho ea dzo gan iswaho kha  Government Gazette (Vol 660, No 43414 nga  a 8 Fulwi 2020). U ya nga  ho ea dzo bveledziswaho, nga fhasi ha  evele ya Vhuvhili ya nyiledzo dza u tshimbila, matshudeni vha swikaho 66% vha  o tendelwa u humela khemphasi dza yunivesithi.2.3.    I  anganedza u humela nga u tou dedengela ha matshudeni a gudedzi  a Vhupfumbudzi na Pfunzo ya Mishumo ya zwan a na Thekhinikhala, u vulwa hafhu ha senthara dza Pfunzo ya Tshitshavha na Vhupfumbudzi na u humela mushumoni ha vhashumi. Hezwi zwi  o itwa u ya nga pulane dza ndangulo ya COVID -19 dzo dodombedzwaho dza sekhithara yo he, na u khwa hisedza tsireledzo i bvelaho phan a ya matshudeni na vhashumi, ngeno hu tshi khou tendelwa tswikelelo khulwane ya u guda na u funzwa ha matshudeni manzhi.3.    U lwa na zwiito zwa vhua a3.1.    Khabinethe yo dovholola u sumbedzisa vhu ikumedzeli hayo u khwa hisedza uri mavharivhari malugana na thengo dza tshomedzo dza COVID-19 a khou  o isiswa nga u  avhanya nga mazhendedzi a tshumiso ya mulayo u fana na Yuniti ya U  o isisa yo Khetheaho (SIU). Avho vha kwameaho vha  o  ewa nda iso i lemelaho vhukuma, na tshelede yo tswiwaho kha Muvhuso nga khamphani na vhathu vha si na mikhwa yavhu i vhe vha gonyisa lwo kalulaho mitengo ya tshomedzo dza u  itsireledza i  o waniwa murahu.3.2.    Khabinethe i takadzwa hafhu nga mvelaphan a yo itwaho nga Komiti ya Dziminista ine Minista wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi Vho Ronald Lamula vha vha mudzulatshidulo wayo. Thimu ya Dziminista yo vha i khou lavhelelwa u konanya khuvhanganyo ya thengo dzo itwaho dzo he dzi elanaho na COVID-19 uri tshitshavha na tshone tshi kone u i vhona. U itela vhubvelakhagala, webusaithi ya Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka (www.treasury.gov.za) yo an adza mafhungo a vhunzhi ha mihasho na zwiimiswa zwe zwa tevhedza nga vhu alo.  3.3.    Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka vhu  o isa phan a na mushumo wo engedzwaho wa u khwinisa mafhungo o rumelwaho u itela uri a bveledzwe. Khabinethe i ombedzela hafhu uri mazhendedzi a tshumiso ya mulayo a  o isa phan a na u vha na vhu ifhinduleli ha mushumo wa vhu o isisi.3.4.    Nga kha tshumisano vhukati ha mazhendedzi a tshumiso ya mulayo, ine ya konanya mushumo wa mazhendedzi a tshumiso ya mulayo o he, o lugela u  etshedza Muphuresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa muvhigo wa vhege dza rathi dzi we na dzi we wa u thoma kha vhege ya u thoma ya Khubvumedzi 2020.3.5.    Khabinethe i  o  ea thikhedzo yo teaho mazhendedzi a tshumiso ya mulayo. Hezwi zwi  o katela u a  ea zwiko zwine a  o a u shuma nga n ila yo fhelelaho, o  iimisa nga o he a si na nyofho, u dzhia sia na luvhengelambiluni kha u tshimbidza  ho isiso na vhutshutshisi ha milandu i elanaho na zwiito zwa vhua a kha tshifhinga tshi sa fhedzi mbilu.  3.6.    Tshi uhu tsha zwiito zwa vhua a, vhune ha khou  ivhonadza nga kha vhuvhava vhune ha khou itwa masiari tshivhangalala na u phusukanywa ha zwiko zwa muvhuso, i tou vha khentsa i kwamaho tshitshavha tsho he ine ya vha na khonadzeo ya u tshinyadza fulufhelo  a tshitshavha kha ndingedzo dzo  anganelaho dza muvhuso dza u khwinisa matshilo a vhathu. Khabinethe i sasaladza nga n ila dzo he zwiito zwo he zwa vhua a nahone i na fulufhelo  a uri vhatshinyi hu si kale vha  o tshutshiswa, hu si na nyofho kana u dzhia sia.3.7.    Khabinethe i ita khuwelelo kha Maafrika Tshipembe vho he uri vha vhige zwiito zwa vhua a kha Lu ingo thwii lwa U lwa na zwiito zwa Vhua a lwa Lushaka kha 0800 701 701.B.    Tsheo dza Khabinethe1.    Mbekanyamushumo dza Vhupfumbudzi ha mira o ya Khorondangi na vhalanguli vhahulwane kha Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha1.1.    Khabinethe yo tendela mbekanyamushumo dza vhupfumbudzi mbili dzine dza  o bveledza vhu ikumedzeli ha u fha ha khaphasithi ya muvhuso. Ya mathomo ndi vhupfumbudzi ha Tshikolo tsha Tshimedzi tsha Vhuvhusi ha zwa Ikonomi, ha mira o ya Khorondangi u bva kha masia o he a muvhuso. Yo itelwa u  an avhudza masia a u guda nga kha musaukanyo na vhu umani vhukati ha tshenzhemo na zwine zwa khou gudwa zwi tshi ya nga mvumbo ya khaedu dza muvhuso. I  o tshimbidzwa nga Tshikolo tsha Lushaka tsha Muvhuso (NSG), nga tshumisano na Wits School of Governance na OR Tambo School of Leadership.1.2.    Mbekanyamushumo ya vhuvhili yo itelwa  hoho dza mihasho. Yo vhumbwa nga zwipi a zwiraru, zwine zwa vha  Mbekanyamushumo ya U  ivhadza na U gudisa mishumo Khorondangi, Mbekanyamushumo ya Pfunzo ya Khorondangi, na mbekanyamushumo ntswa ine ya pfi Etella. Mbekanyamushumo idzi dzi  o tshimbidzwa nga  NSG, nga kha vhushumisani na  University College London.  2.    U fhiriselwa phan a ha  uvha  a vhu ambo ha Dzangano   a zwa Lwanzheni  a Dzitshaka  a 2020 he ha vha vhu tshi  o farelwa kha  shango  ashu (IMO)2.1.    Nga vhanga  a tshiwo tsha dwadze  a COVID-19  Khabinethe yo tendela u fhiriselwa phan a ha  uvha  a IMO  e  a vha  i tshi  o farelwa kha  ino na vhu ambo he ha vha vhu tshi  o vha hone nga tshifhinga tshithihi ha  uvha  a zwa Lwanzheni  a  ifhasi, u bva nga Tshimedzi 2020 u swika Tshimedzi 2021. Khabinethe yo tendela u vha  emu i wa vhu ambo uvhu nga Lara  2015.C.    Milayotibe1.    Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Vha etshedzi vha Zwibveledzwa kha zwa Vhulimi wa 20181.1.    Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Vha etshedzi vha Zwibveledzwa kha zwa Vhulimi wa 2018 Phalamenndeni. Khwiniso dzi  o a u tsireledza pfanelo dza vhabveledzi kha masia a si na ndango a vha etshedzi vha zwibveledzwa zwitete. Wa vhuya wa phasiswa wa vha mulayo, vha etshedzi , vhukati ha zwi we, vha  o kombetshedzwa u dzhia ndindakhombo ya ndozwo i vhaho hone nga u sa fulufhedzea na u vhulunga dziakhanthu dza thirasithi.1.2.    Khwiniso dzo dzinginywaho kha Mulayotibe dzo  olwa nga vhu alo na vhashelamulenzhe vho he vho teaho. Tshanduko dzi  o dovha dza khwinisa zwikhala zwa tswikelelo kha makete kha vhabveledzi vha mabindu ma uku khathihi na vha etshedzi vha zwibveledzwa vhe kale vha vha vha sa wani tshumelo dzo raliho, vharengisi na vharengisi vha zwi ira ani.2.    Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Pfanelo ya Vhu e kha zwipi a zwa Tshifha o2.1.    Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe Phalamenndeni. Mulayotibe u  o a u Khwinisa Mulayo wa Pfanelo ya Vhu e kha zwipi a zwa Tshifha o, wa , 1986 (Act 95 of 1986), u itelaho mathomo a zwikimu zwa pfanelo ya vhu e kha zwipi a zwa Tshifha o. Khwiniso dzo dzinginywaho dzi  etshedza vhupfadzi na u tsireledza vhahiri kha zwifha o nga fhasi ha nzudzanyo ya khethekanyo ya zwifha o.3.    Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mulayo wa zwa Khetho wa 20203.1.    Khabinethe yo tendela u rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso wa Mulayo wa zwa Khetho wa 2020 Phalamenndeni.. Mulayotibe u khwinisa zwipi a zwiraru zwa theo ya mulayo, zwine zwa vha, Mulayo wa Khomishini ya zwa Khetho, wa , 1996 (Act 51 of 1996);  Mulayo wa zwa Khetho, wa 1998 (Act 73 of 1998) na Mulayo wa zwa Khetho dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa 2000 (Act 27 of 2000).3.2.    Tshanduko dzo dzinginywaho dzi  o khwa hisa maitele a vhusimamulayo a re hone. Khwiniso, vhukati ha zwi we, dzi  o thoma vhutumbuli ha maitele a zwa khetho  hu tshi khou tevhedzwa maitele a khwinisa kushumele kwavhu i kwa Khomishini ya zwa Khetho yo  iimisaho kha u langa dzikhetho.D. U tholwaU tholwa ho he hu  o itwa ho thoma ha khwa hisedzwa ndalukanyo dza vho tholwaho na u sedzwa arali vha si na milandu.1.    U engedzwa ha khon hiraka ya Vho Hubert Mathanzima Mweli sa Mulangi Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Mutheo lwa tshifhinga tsha mi waha mi anu.2.    Bodo ya Poswo ya Afrika Tshipembe:a.    Vho Emmanuel Lekgau;b.    Vho Nolitha Pieters;c.    Vho Sandile Phillip;d.    Vho Sipho Majombozi; nae.    Vho Yvette Lillian Mavivi Myakayaka-Manzini.3.    Vhalangi vha si mira o ya vhulanguli vha Postbank SOC Limited:a.    Vho Gcobani Mancotywa;b.    Vho Darwin Zinzile Nkonki;c.    Vho Thabile Wonci; andd.    Adv Vho Leigh Hefer-Hendrikse.Mbudziso: Vho Phumla Williams   Muambeli wa KhabinetheLu ingothendeleki: 083 501 0139

title: Tshi atamennde tsha Mu angano wa Vitshua a wa Khabinethe wo farwaho nga  avhuraru,  a 9 Khubvumedzi 2020
text: A. Mafhungo a zwa Mupo1. Maswa-maswa a Dwadze  a tshitzhili tsha Corona (COVID-19) 1.1. Khabinethe i  anganedza u tsa ha tshivhalo tsha kheisi ntswa dzo khwa hisedzwaho dza COVID-19 vhegeni dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho na phimo yo khwinifhalaho ya vho fholaho ine yo engedzea nga 87%. Tshivhalo tsha vhathu vhane vha tea u valelwa kha zwibadela zwashu na  ho ea ya ndingo dza COVID-19 natsho tsho tsa. 1.2. Khabinethe i livhuwa maAfrika Tshipembe vho he kha u shela mulenzhe kha u tevhedza nyiledzo dza u linganya mudzenga. Ri kho a vhu ikumedzeli na tshi havhelo zwo itwaho nga vha ivhi vha zwa mutakalo vhe vha ima phan a kha u ri tsireledza kha tshitzhili.      1.3. Kha ri fha e kha nungo dza mafhungo aya a  u uwedzaho na u isa phan a na u shumisana kha u isa phan a na u ita zwo teaho, u fana na u ita n owen owe ya u sa ima tsini-tsini na mu we muthu, u ambara masiki musi vha fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi, na u  amba zwan a nga tshisibe kana u shumisa tshithatha-tshitzhili (sanitiser) tshi na a ikhoholo kha zwan a.  1.4. Khabinethe i  u uwedza vhathu vho he vha Afrika Tshipembe uri vha dauni ode App ya mahala ya COVID Alert SA ubva kha Apple App Store kana kha Google Play. Muhasho wa Mutakalo wo  ivhadza app sa tshi we tshishumiswa tsha u  ivhisa maAfrika Tshipembe arali vho  i wana vhe fhethu hu na muthu a na COVID-19. App iyi i khwa hisedza nndwa yashu sa lushaka ya u lwa na u pha alala ha tshitzhili.  1.5.
